Summary: This hotel is a great value, you get a lot for what you pay. There is a free shuttle to and from Disneyland which we used. The breakfast buffet had plenty of choices and tasted good as well. It opens from 6-9 which is nice. There were hot selections of scrambled eggs, yummy potatoes, biscuit with gravy, French toast, rice. They had cold selections like the usual cereal, bagels, pastries and was glad they had fresh fruit, pineapple, cantaloupe, oranges etc. They even had Chinese rice porridge. I would stay here again because of the awesome breakfast buffet!   The building is old but the room itself and bathroom were both clean and didn't see any bugs. The a/c worked well and wifi was decently fast. Only con I'd have to give is that we couldn't go to the pool and we really wanted

Summary: My husband and I were evacuated from our home due to the Canyon 2 fire and all the hotels closer to our house were completely full by the time we started to look for a place to stay for 1 - 2 nights.  The Howard Johnson Hotel on Houston Ave in Fullerton is conveniently located off the 91 fwy with easy fwy access in both directions.  They have plenty of parking with a security guard patrolling the lots during the night so we felt our cars were safe.  The front desk staff were extremely nice and helpful.  The entire Hotel is non-smoking which is really important to us. They only had a room with 2 double beds but it was an inside room on the first floor and was very quiet...no freeway noise at all. The Hotel does need to be updated as the carpets were old and worn,  the interior

Summary Heading: An adequate stay for a value price
Summary: This hotel is dated and could use an upgrade. The lobby area appears to have been recently redone but the rest of the hotel could use some upgrades. My room was comfortable and quiet. The basic amenities were all there. The staff was a little slow but friendly and accommodating. There is plenty of parking, an outdoor pool, and a coin operated laundry on the premise. The lounge was closed and the restaurant was only serving a breakfast buffet (6-9am) during my stay. If the buffet is included in your price, that is a good deal. There are plenty of strip malls and restaurants within walking distance or a short drive away. The hotel is also located close to the 91 Freeway and a few minutes away from Anaheim.

Summary Heading: New Management Has Saved The Day
Summary: The elegance of this facility remains a big draw and it's obvious that great strides are being made to improve it's condition with remodeling in progress in many area. As one who literally lives on the road, spending nearly every night in a hotel somewhere, I deal with hotel staff across the country every day.  The superior service rendered by Ichel, Sasha and Jessica in particular will keep this Motorcoach Operator coming back, time and time again.

Summary: The hotel had apparently had no working computer system for 2 weeks. As a large school party, they had no idea who was in which room. One of our party was sent to a room already occupied by somebody else. When re-roomed they were  given a room already occupied by one of our party. All sorts of implications for security and especially safety in the event of a fire alarm. The duty manager asked us what she was expected to do! Staff rude and uncooperative when our concerns were registered. Rooms tired and in need of refurbishment, ice making machine and vending ares not working on one floor. Buffet breakfast reasonable but geared towards Chinese guests.
Cockroach in the room, no hotwater first day, dead phone, worn interior, loads of Chineese bus tourists...

This hotel needs serious renovations. The elevators stopped several times, the outside doors were jammed, sink leaked the entire time we were there, even after we asked for it to be fixed 3X! The worst thing was the water in the shower, it came out scalding hot and burned my child mid shower and then they turned the water off, had to finish shower with OUR OWN BOTTLED WATER!

The check in clerk was rude and not very helpful.  When I registered online I explained that I didn't see a place to list amount of adults and children; therefore I was a breakfast ticket for one person.  There was 2 adults and (2) children within my group.  She didn't attempt to adjust it.

Howard Johnson Fullerton Anaheim "MOTEL" and Conference Center NEEDS an ENTIRE OVERHAUL. My family of 8-members stayed at this ROACH infested "motel" the week of June 25th-June 28th, 2017.  YES, ROACHES in the laundry room, ice galley/soda machine area. This is the worst place I have ever stayed.  Filthy, stinky, gross and outdated. While we where there, 2-days out of the week we were informed the water would be shut off from 11am-4pm.  I'm sure this was a scheduled service well in advance, therefore the "motel" has the responsibility of contacting customers PRIOR to their stay to let them know this was taking place, and to give the guest/s the opportunity to look into alternate accommodations.  They had contact information and could have contacted guests.  Instead a piece of

Summary Heading: Filing complaint about the front desk male worker, Sasha
Summary: The front desk female manager was super nice and thoughtful and we got very good impression about fullerton when we tried to get some hot water from front desk. But later late night the next door wall was having construction drilling noises loudly and i called front desk. Unfortunately the guy, Sasha only coldly replied "We don't have construction work in the hotel" and didn't even try to find out what's going on. Just repeatedly saying they don't have construction work even after i remind him if they may try to find out and solve the problem. When I couldn't hold it and asking him if he wants me as a customer to find out what's going on and solve the problem for your hotel. He said " Don't yell at me, I am very busy here" and hanged off the phone. Unbelievable horrible

One of the worst dumps i've ever stayed in! Hall ways stunk of cat urine...rooms reeked of mold... Once you got past the lobby it was old dirty and disgusting!! House keepers only slapped the room backed together...tossed some soap into the bathroom and put the sheets on the bed...not straight and put the cover and pillows back on the bed. If we were there foe any other reason than a family funeral would not have stayed....what a dump!!!!
The room was being worked on, paint was obviously stopped in the middle of being done, the room was basically in the middle of construction

Summary Heading: The employee that checked us in was not very informative...

The beds were comfortable and overall room was clean, but bathroom needs some sprucing up.
Bed was awful. Bathroom was disgusting. I took my issues to the front desk. I was told there was no general manager and the owner would not speak to me.

Summary Heading: The rooms and hallway stunk.  I had to ask for another room...
Summary: The rooms and hallway stunk.  I had to ask for another room because the first smelled really bad.  The breakfast was not as good as it was supposed to be. The internet kept shutting down.  Overall I will not stay here again

Room was ok. I guess being in LA for 150 you should not expect the best. The rooms was ok. The hotel looled dirty and old in the hallways and elevators. There was no fridge. The front of the hotel was amazing but did not maych the rest of the hotel. I would not stay again. The room felt dirty to me.
The service is great very nice people  and food was okay.  But the Room's carpet was not clean my kids were coughing and my feet were dirty becsuse of the carpet it was room 220.
The first room small so bad, they change us but was not the best. Also the breakfast eas to grease. Not to many options.

This hotel is not fancy at all.. it is simple, but the breakfast was awesome, the room was clean and the bed was super comfy! The front desk was amazingly pleasant and I did not have any trouble at all.

I picked this hotel to have a relaxing stay. It was not very clean. The spa was boarded up. There were spiders in the bathroom. All ice machines on every floor were out and the front desk would not help. The front elevators were out of order. The front desk person was not helpful and offered no answers. I asked for late check out and ended up checking out three hours before check out due to not being comfortable in a dirty environment.

I"m giving this hotel a one star rating because of it's WiFi. Prior to booking this hotel I called the hotel to confirm they‚Äã had high speed internet. The hotel staff ensured me that they had really fast reliable internet. The reason why internet is so important for me is that's how I make my money. Well when we checked in the WiFi connected at .05 megs . That's 50kbs , I talked to the hotel staff and they ensured me that they would fix it by restarting the router. They restarted , still didn't fix the speed. I advised the staff of the issue, nothing was fixed. So now I have to speed my nights in a Starbucks/ Denny's to get work done instead of my hotel room. So if you need internet do not use this hotel. I've been here since Saturday and I leave in three four days . Hopefully

Close to Disneyland...Sprouts, Target, and fast food chains are within walking distance. Front desk and housekeeping staff also rendered good service.  Room is just outdated but nevertheless clean.  Parking space is big. This is one great value hotel in Fullerton/Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: The good, bad, and ugly honest review
Summary: The good: Staff is super sweet which is the ONLY reason why I stayed on until I couldn't take it anymore. The bad and ugly:  Under construction which you don't find out until after check-in. Rooms, amenities and decor are dated and in need of major overhaul. Security doors rarely worked so a lot of homeless traffic at night came inside to use inside restrooms on backside of lobby.  2nd room was awful, smelled of mold, peeling paint, paint splatter and disgusting stains on carpet, mold in the grout in bathroom shower & tub, rusted door jams, missing and loose electrical plugs, had to crawl under desk and unplug the lamp or TV so I could charge my phone...I could go on and have pics to prove my review. The best thing this place has going for it is the friendly staff. From front of

The hotel has a great friendly staff that is very helpful to your needs. The rooms are nice but need some up grade. The floors are a nasty carpet that is stained and very old, I prefer hotels to have hard wood floor so that I'm not always wondering what's on this. Otherwise, the rooms are acceptable and clean it's a great value for the money especially that they serve a hot breakfast that you don't have to prepare yourself and there's a variety of food choices. I have stayed here several times and will definitely stay here again.
This is the Cleanest Hotel I have stayed at My Friend had one problem she was Charged twice from the hotel and is trying to fix it now

I went to downtown Fullerton with friends and decided to stay at the hotel. The front desk name Jessica was very friendly through the check in process she made conversation with us and very kind. Our room was small but very clean. The only downfall it's not updated. Overall I will definitely visit again.
it was OK but the rooms were really small and it didnt have a microwave or a fridge and the beds kept on moving of the edges and its hot and the air conditioning was terrible
No regular coffee in room only decaf. The room wasn't clean until really late in the day like 5 pm
Room and amenities were great but this is the first room we can remember that didn't have even a small refrigerator.

The outside and the lobby were real nice and made me feel like I made a good choice of hotels. And then I got up to my room and it smelled like mold and was out dated and didn't have a fridge or microwave in the room. And the bathroom toilet had issues flushing. And the internet would not work on any of my devices. For the price I paid my wife and myself were unhappy

The worst hotel ever!!!!!! Need to go visit family or anything near by they r one hotel that will not inform u about there info or explain there process. My boyfriend had a work meeting at 12pm we came in the hotel to check in early due to him not going to be around. We let the clerk know he has a meeting n won't be around and to call me when the room is ready. They did so, I was excited to not wait in the car for hours n be able to be comfy is our room for the wait but, when going to get the room keys clerk forgot to mention that there is a $50 hold on a card to get keys. I didn't have enough on any of my cards. That's why we came in before so everything will be sorted out. The worst place ever I swear never had service like this and we travel a lot. Never again, never again

I was there for one night.  Since it is also a convention center they had a reception and band playing.  I called the front desk at 11:00 pm asking when the music will stop, and they said in about 45 minutes.  The walls are thin (heard a man use the bathroom) and the carpets are dirty.  They do have a nice breakfast buffet and the staff is friendly.

I got in my room after having to go all the way around and they said it was a poolview made it sound nice, but I got to my room and there was a huge tree blocking my room plus it was all the way in the corner.

I was very disappointing to pay more than 130$ for such an old room, no hot water for hours smelly, and the last room of an endless ugly corridor. I would never suggest this hotel, for the quality it should be the half of the price

They would not refund my money... I called several times... I called to cancel my room and they said they will and not charge me... they still charged me I called several times to get a refund.. still have not got it

The room was clean but has a slight smell. We asked to have the window opened and that fixed it. The beds were small but comfy. The room and the pool were clean. The breakfast was also a good value with the choices.
I been staying at this hotel every other month . Going on 3 months . This was the firs time I was ever told about your  rewards

Summary Heading: Could be an excellent hotel stay
Summary: The carpets were very dirty and need to be replaced. Otherwise the room was clean.  Like the location.  Staff at the front desk were very helpful!!  Booked 2 tours right from the lobby which was very convenient and we were picked up right there since we didn't have a car. Breakfast was very good!! A whole buffet!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the service level of our staff and that they were abe to book you an enjoyable tour. Please know within the coming months, our hotel will be undergoing cosmetic and amenity upgrades. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Rooms are old and outdated, dirty carpet. Location is great and breakfast was great so it out weighed the lacking of the room. Bed was comfy, great nights sleep and the shuttle drivers were AMAZING! always on time and very very helpful! Overall they are very accmodating with our needs. Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are truly happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and took advantage of our complimentary shuttle.  We will definitely share your kind words  with the shuttle drivers. We are constantly looking to do upgrades to our  rooms, we appreciate your feedback. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: it needs a lot of work . Jessica at the front desk was very nice. i ran a hotel for 7 years and was not very happy.

We visited two days ago and to be honest it was really good, sure is not the most modern hotel, but for staying After you are very tired i think thats all you need; has a hair dryer, tv, wifi (doest work really well) and breakfast!!!! Yes really good i only give them a 4 for the wifi inconveniences.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is wonderful hearing that you enjoyed your stay and our breakfast! We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary: We had arrived on a Sunday after driving for 9 hours. We were told that our room was ready (this was about 2.30pm). We were placed on the second floor. The elevator that was convenient for us was all but convenient. In order to push the valet cart on to the elevator we had to go past the ramp, maneuver the cart into the elevator and it took about 5 minutes just to push it in to the elevator. When we arrived to our room it was hot and muggy, and turned out to not be cleaned and there was a musty/moldy smell due to the heater being on full blast and having wet towels scattered in the restroom. They then tried to move us back down to the first floor, but was not going to help us move the cart that was a pain to get up to the second floor. They were able to get us a room on the

I found this hotel to meet my every need.  The room was comfortable and clean on the first floor.  There was some construction going on down the hall but I was out of the room each morning early to enjoy the buffet and then head to Universal with family one day and Disney the rest of my time.  The buffet was very large and had many options.  I especially liked the fact the bacon was crispy.  This benefit helped save money for me and I would do the same for families, prior to taking the free shuttle to Disney.  I would stay here again and appreciate the service of everyone I encountered.  You can also easily walk to a Target, AMC Movie Theatre and many places to eat.  I took the train down, so Uber was another source of transportation I used other than the shuttle to Disney.
This HOJO is a hotel and convention center, there are lots of rooms. But the room is very old. Price is good if you looking for somewhere to sleep for 1 night.

Our stay could of been a little better, we didn't stay the longest but we were there 2 days both days I ask for extra towels while I left my room and when returning nothing was there   I spoke with both maids and front desk and no actions where taking   Also spoke with front desk about my ac making a louder then usual sound and if we could move to another room because of the noise, I was assured they will call me back and not one word was said to me for the remainder of my stay

The hotel was very clean. Had a good breakfast. Not just the little continental breakfast we're all used to. They also have a pretty regular shuttle to disneyland. The price was good for everything we got. Also has a little store in the lobby for everything you might need before heading to a theme park. Would definitely stay again.

Summary Heading: rooms need lot of improvement,,total hotel is too old..only...
Summary: rooms need lot of improvement,,total hotel is too old..only better is breakfast..pillows are too big.

Summary Heading: Previous one night stay at the Howard Johnson
Summary: My previous stay at the Howard Johnson was a little disappointing.  The cleanliness of the room was highly questionable!

I spent one night, and it was nice, the room was good, there was no smell, had a variety of channels, and the bed was comfortable.  The breakfast Buffet was included in my room price, and it was very good.  There was eggs, bacon, pancakes, waffles,and your regular fare   The down side was the wifi was spotty, it worked good enough, but if I were to be there for more than 1 night I might change to a better room with better reception.

Staff tried to fix wifi problems but after changing rooms multiple times it was still an issue.  Outside traffic was loud and room was not in the best repair.  Wall paper pealing off, bathroom repairs done poorly and not finished, wall paper missing.  Furniture old.  Staff was very friendly, but hotel needs work.

When my boyfriend and I were forced to leave our apartment in the middle of the night due to pests, we were out of luck at most places. We are so fortunate that we happened upon the Howard Johnson Inn Fullerton! David, the property manager, was exceedingly helpful, especially when we had to extend our stay another night. Every staff member we interacted with was friendly. Top it off with  the convenient location, delightful continental breakfast, and clean rooms and this Hojo's is a must stay!

Comfy bed, free wifi, breakfast and parking. Which were all good- can't complain.  But- I could hear the rooms on both sides of me. We were woken up to a fire alarm and we all had to go outside at 6am, staff were confused and asked why we were out there. Ummmm the whole hotel was woken!! People yelling and screaming at the pool until 12am- we experienced this every night of our 5 night stay. On our last night we were woken by loud guests loitering in the hallways and banging on ours doors (it was 3am). There was also blood on the sheets when we arrived, each morning we requested they be changed, not once were they changed- so always had to have a towel down
no internet connection, not clean,terrible only 2 good things:  nice staff , acceptable breakfast. everything else was bad .i wont recommend it

Summary Heading: Beware, the maid will enter your room to clean without...
Summary: Beware, the maid will enter your room to clean without warning, no knock on the door, no nothing! It was a good thing I was fully dressed and not sitting on the toilet!!

We had a long day of travel did not get to hotel to 1030pm.  When we got our room keys they did not work.  Had to keep walking back and forth to the front desk also to try and change rooms.  Our first room reaked like cigarettes the ceiling was grey with ash residue.  Everything was out dated and looked old and not clean. Literally the worst room I could imagine.  We asked for another room and waited and walked some more.  This room was slightly better but still smelled and had other issues like very loud cars zooming by outside and missing tiles in the bathroom..  They said that was the only other room they had available and we checked at near by hotels and everywhere was booked.  So we had no choice but to stay there.  Did not get a complimentary breakfast as promised and the

This hotel is in desperate need of repair. The entire building smells of mildew. The wallpaper in the hallways and rooms is peeling, the paint that is still on the walls and doors is cracked and old but most of it was worn off. The staff was nice but the hotel is horrible. Also, they advertise the rooms come with refrigerators but then when you get there you have to request one be brought to your room AND you get an extra $11 per night. So the rooms do NOT actually come with a fridge.
I really liked it here. It was safe and comfortable. Front desk is really nice and accommodating.

Summary Heading: Clean, but loud and very, very old rooms.
Summary: While the rooms were clean, they are so outdated they look terrible. The dresser and the mirror in the bathroom were scratched up. There were holes over both beds from where something must have once been hung. The wallpaper is so old and discolored and peeling. The curtains have to be from the seventies. The bathroom baseboards and tiles were breaking apart. We were gone from 9-1:00 one day and our room still wasn't made up when we returned. Called to have it done and it took an hour for housekeeping to finally go clean the room. The hotel is right on the freeway. It feels and sounds like you are sleeping in the merging lane and the loud air conditioner doesn't even drown that out. The hallways and rooms still smell of smoke and I'm sure smoking hasn't been allowed in years. The
This hotel is clean, comfortable and affordable. It isn't a resort of fancy so if that what you are looking for keep moving.

Summary Heading: False Advertising. Rundown hotel. Terrible Managment
Summary: Hotel claims to offer: Priority early Check-in, Priority late Checkout, and Free Drinks for those who have Genius Perks and book on Booking.com, but they do not! They do not honor their agreement they had with Booking.com. I called and complained to Booking.com representatives and they too are investigating Howard Johnson's misleading ad.  The hotel is very rundown. Our room and bathroom was beyond needs for repair. The toilet kept running. The shower water pressure was very low. The shower curtain wasn't installed properly, it is very loose and unsafe. The room smells awful when you use the A/C or heater, mold and old. Also, the plug outlets were broken, very loose, which is dangerous and spark a fire. The walls and floor were stained and damaged. It was a very ugly rundown

It is good value resort for a visit to disneyland ... old but clean, nice breakfast but only opens from 6-9am ... should be open until 10... free shuttle to disneyland. Staff was good specially the housekeeping staff. Right next to freeway 91 and easily asssesible if you have a car. Pretty happy with the price i paid through hotels.com as i get 3 nights for the price of 2.

Summary Heading: The room was adequate. The bathroom  had some mold but...
Summary: The room was adequate. The bathroom  had some mold but overall clean. The shuttle to Disneyland was great. The Shuttle isnt available for Magic hour. Breakfast buffet was great with a large variety. Gift shop was reasonable. All around friendly staff. Walking distance to several food places and Target.

Once you got pass the Lobby it was not so good. Room very dated toilet was in need of replacement. It just would work called maintenance peson came to plung, but it did nothing. So we couldn't use the bathroom.

Summary Heading: Spacious Rooms, a little dated but great value for money.
Summary: This hotel is 15 min free shuttle away from Disneyland which we loved because you were away from the hustle and bustle.  There's a laundrette in the hotel, breakfast was included and parking was free which is a huge bonus.  There is also a shopping complex next door that has a great supermarket to stock up on healthy snacks and water and not pay Disneyland prices.  The hotel is a little dated but the rooms are spacious and clean and it certainly did the job for our stay

Summary Heading: The room was the comfort of home. There was not any noises in the hall and was able to sleep throughout the night.
Summary: The room was great, all the comforts of home. I would recommend a stay with your kids and great for family reunions. Stores real close by and very close to Disneyland theme park.

I read a lot of reviews and was concerned . But some people are so petty. The hotel was fine, It is a little aged but still ok ,our room was clean, the lobby nice, the breakfast was decent.The shuttle was great. The staff was polite.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit your review. We are happy to hear that our staff was friendly and accommodating, and that you enjoyed the buffet breakfast and our complimentary Disneyland shuttle. We look forward to seeing you and your family soon!  Best Travels, Elizabeth Padron Front Office Manager

Summary: The room where we stayed was smelly, bathroom did not have an exost, staff in the dining area were not nice, they even had us pay for my son's breakfast, we have 4 adults and 3 children but we had 2 rooms, 2 kids were free per room but we still paid for my other son rooms look old and doors, only the lobby looks nice! Interneg was slow!

The location was perfect for me, close to shopping, food and the highway. The rooms were clean and the staff was good. The hotel seems to cater to a lot of tours and is usually busy. The only downfall was that there wasn't an attached restaraunt for dinners.

Summary Heading: HoJo Fullerton hot complimentary breakfast is great but cleanliness of bed linen, carpet etc could be improved upon
Summary: This hotel has a lot of potential. Apparently the hotel is popular with Chinese tourists and there are some signs in English and Chinese at the hotel. There were rude Asian tourists blocking entrance when I tried to enter. At the buffet, a polite little Asian boy said "Excuse me," in a heavy accent when we accidentally crossed paths. The complimentary breakfast is from 6 am to 9 am and was varied and decent. There was juice, milk, scrambled eggs, biscuits, creamy country-style gravy, bacon, sausage, bread (wheat/white), fruit (cantaloupe, watermelon, apple, banana), rice, hash browns, cereal and more. I enjoyed the breakfast, which you normally have to eat there and not have it to go. The breakfast made up for the problems I had at the hotel. Check in was ok. The front desk

I had a wonderful stay at the Howard Johnson Fullerton.  The only thing was that they are under some construction, one of the dryers didn't work and I thought that they had a fitness center of which they did not. But the rooms and service was wonderful. Best hotel I have stayed at on my two week vacation up and down the California coast! Great Price and Free Buffet Breakfast! Kids loved it. The outdoor pool is also heated.
Manager Response: Dear marybG8105SV, Thank you so much for your review! We are truly happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Howard Johnson in Fullerton. We are constantly looking to do upgrades both to our public areas and rooms, we appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you back soon.  best travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: rci resort used exchange points and fee for my stay. i will never never let them do that to me. the manager refer to stain as stain only. not dirty.  dont remove your shoes ever. even in shower.  staff has bad attitude. i booked two connected room. with black and white. the lady check in for me confirmed it. but it was not. when i went down stair and tell them..it was not connected room. they told me to call expedia..i said i was not book with expedia.. stay away from this one folks
Manager Response: Dear Kee L, Thank you for writing your review. We want to apologize if your experience with our hotel was not a positive one. We do our best to accommodate and honor any guest request. We hope to earn your business again our hotel will be undergoing renovation in the coming months.  best travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Rm 418 Should Be Taken Out of Service; Vomit Smell Permeated
Summary: I travel often and have never stayed at a Howard Johnson before. However, seeing that it was affiliated with Wyndham, decided to give it a go. We booked a room with 2 beds at this location. After a 6 hour drive, we arrived close to 1030p at night for check in, tired from the drive and recovering from colds. We had an early morning flight out of San Diego and still had two hours to drive after a nights sleep. We were assigned Room 418. It had a faint smell of something bad but because of my congestion it was hard to tell at first what that might be. We climbed into the single King size bed and made an attempt at sleeping. The bed had a single threadbare blanket with a sheet on either side of it. No weight to it at all and then I caught my first whiff of something bad from the

Summary Heading: Complimentary breakfast the best part of the hotel
Summary: The rooms are big, spacious and comfortable. We stayed there for three nights with a break in between when we visited SFO, 17 mile drive and Monterey from December 5th to the 9th 2016. The bed is king size and cozy. The room has all facilities like kettle, T.V. internet. The best thing I liked about the hotel was its complimentary breakfast. The buffet consists of waffles, pancakes, fruit, juices, yoghurt, scrambled egg and a variety of vegetarian rice ( something like pulao). I'm only mentioning the vegetarian dishes since I am a vegetarian. The staff are very cordial and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear SUVARNA P, Thank you so much for your FIVE star review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your feedback on our buffet breakfast. We hope that you can visit us again soon.  best travels Frank Zuniga  Front office manager

Summary: Not the best hotel. They shut off the water for a long period of time in the middle of the day. Customer service is not the best, a little rude actually. 3 star hotel for sure.
Manager Response: Dear jennifer T, Thank you for your review! We want to apologized if your stay with us was not a positive one. We appreciate your feedback and want you to know that the issues you have mentioned will not be overlooked. We hope to earn your business back.   best travels  Frank Zuniga  front office manager

Summary: I very much enjoyed my stay! The room was very clean & the bed & pillows were comfy. I enjoyed the free breakfast buffet as well. The staff were pleasant & helpful. no issues!
Manager Response: Dear ericcB7188EE, Thank you so much for your five star review! We are thrilled to hear that your stay was a positive one. We appreciate your feedback and will be sharing your review with our staff. We hope to see you back soon.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: Came down to Anaheim on a business trip for three nights. Have stayed at multiple HoJo's is an ok property - you get what you pay for.  The buffet breakfast came in handy and I have to say that the greeter and table staff were particularly excellent. Kudos to MARIA M and LAURA for continually checking in on my table to make certain everything was perfect.  I would stay here again especially given being able to get last minute reservations at a reduced rate during a very busy weekend.
Manager Response: Dear steviekeys, Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that your stay was what you expected. We appreciate your feedback and will let Maria and Laura know what a great job they did. We hope that you and your family come back soon.  best travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: It was all good but i got charge two times i called the hotel and left emails regarding my stay and why they charged my card two time fir 217.78 on my card ending in 4608 i got charged on the 10 of jan 2017 and the 14 jan 2017 got charge twice getting frustrated causevi dont get answer from i guys
Manager Response: Dear rolandol725, Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay an apologized for the billing error if you wish to further discuss this issue please feel free to contact us. We hope to see you back soon.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: We come down from the Bay Area for business quite often and have stayed in this hotel 10+ times and we will continue to stay here. Breakfast is a little early for my taste, but still good. (6-9am) Would recommend this hotel to anyone. Also a good location, Owen to shops, restaurants, and very close to Downtown Fullerton!
Manager Response: Dear marsman328, Thank you so much for your review! We are thrilled to hear that your stay was positive one. We appreciate your feedback and suggestions about the breakfast hours this will not be overlooked. We hope to see you back soon.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed 4 nights and had multiple issues with our room. The bathroom light worked sporatically and took 2 service persons to fiix. The sink, tub and toilet would each back up at different times. The room wasn't properly stocked with tissues and toilet paper. The bed was nice and the breakfast buffet was very good.

Stayed for over a week unexpectedly as my 3 year old came down with the flu in the beginning of our Disney Vacation. This hotel had awful customer service, and the rooms were uncomfortable and out dated. The walls are paper thin, we could hear the newborn baby, and the dad with a cough in the room next to us all day and night. The shower was clogged in the first night because there was a disgusting glob of hair in the drain. Our room was in perfect view of the elevator so if we had the curtains open, every one getting off on our floor could see right in. We had an issue that we took full responsibility for, and the staff and security made us feel beyond uncomfortable. We were belittled and treated with zero respect. The ice machines only worked on 1/4 floors, and the area right

Summary Heading: Great breakfast that's the only good thing
Summary: The room smelled like mold.  Opened the window and the whole thing was moldy.  They need to go in rooms and do deep clean.  Don't stay here!!!!

Let me start off by saying that the staff is extremely friendly and accommodating. The hotel is a little old and they are building a new next door. This one is scheduled for a renovation after the other hotel is completed. With that said, the construction never interrupted our stay. Our first room was a little too old for our comfort, the carpets were well worn and the bathroom door was damaged. We went to the front desk and they immediately moved us to a new room without question and provided us with a refrigerator and microwave. Our stay was wonderful and breakfast was great. The shuttle to and from Disney often fills up and they drop off customers and immediately come back to pick up the rest. They run more than every hour and work hard to make your stay amazing.

Check in was great, breakfast was great.  We were put in handicap accessible room though so bathroom wasn't up to standards (no vanity) & no tub (we had kids), air conditioner had foul small so we didn't use so room was humid

Summary Heading: The outlets in the room were loose and plug would not stay...
Summary: The outlets in the room were loose and plug would not stay plugged in and the elevator is out of date and does not work well
Manager Response: Dear P2352DZandreac, Thank you for taking time to write a review! We want to apologized for the inconveniences you encountered during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and want to let you know that the issues you mentioned will not be overlooked. We hope to see you back soon and allow us to make your next stay even better.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: The room was clean, large and just what we needed.  The breakfast was large and tasty!  But most of all they saved us from no room at all when Expedia booked us a hotel nearby that did not exist yet!  Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found a great value in our breakfast buffet. We hope to see you and your family back soon.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Howard Johnson in Fullerton..........for the Disney Crew
Summary: I frequently visit the Brea-Fullerton area and decided to try this hotel as they had some good offers.  The room was spacious the breakfast had a large selection of items for sit down in the dining room. The hotel was mobbed with tourists who use the shuttle service to Disneyland, hence the noisy atmosphere.  The WIFI was pathetic and don't get a room on the Freeway side as it is very noisy starting by 6:30AM through 10PM.
Manager Response: Dear Arthur D, Thank you for writing your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our full breakfast buffet. We do offer rooms facing our swimming pool upon request and we apologized if we did not make that option available to you. We want to thank you for your feedback and would love to earn your business again.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga Front Office Manager  Fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: other than location I chose this motel so my grandchildren could swim.  The pool had been drained and was not ready during the three days we stayed. We were not notified that the pool would be shut down. The last morning there was only luke warm water to shower in.
Manager Response: Dear David K, Thank you for your review! We apologized our pool was close due to maintenance issues and we regret not informing you before your arrival. Our swimming pool is now open and all issues have been resolved and it is now 80 degrees, we hope we can earn your business again. We appreciate your feedback.  Best Travels Frank Zuniga Front Office Manager  Fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary Heading: Rooms were not clean. Toilet didn't flush correctly. Room...
Summary: Rooms were not clean. Toilet didn't flush correctly. Room smelt musty. But was beyond uncomfortable. It had broken springs. Internet was so slow it was unusable. Bathtub didn't have a plug and had rust and corrosion all over drain. Pool was closed the entire visit despite this not being advertised when booking. The only bright spot was breakfast which was fantastic.
Manager Response: Dear brookq243, Thank you for your review! We apologized if your stay was not a positive one. We want you to know that the issues you have mentioned will not be overlooked. We hope you can give us the opportunity to earn your business again.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: Hotel was solid. Great breakfast and the transport to the Disneyland was a huge asset. Our first room was dirty and we were out in a few minutes. Next room was immaculate with everything working. Hotel is dated (apparent remodel next year) but does the job.  The location is great to...it's  really close to Target, Walmart, Costco and a whole bunch of fast food places. The highway generates noise, but if you have the AC on it suppresses it.  Fantastic service by Michelle Latoya at the front desk. She was clearly working hard to keep the hotel running smoothly. Huge asset.
Manager Response: Dear happycouple1234, Thank you so much for your review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate the feedback and will share your kind words with Michelle. We hope to see you back soon.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front office Manager

Summary: Perfectly fine except there weren't bath towels. They'd probably have brought them if I asked, but it was late n I couldn't be bothered. All other aspects were impeccable!
Manager Response: Dear k9100NGraym, Thank you so much for you FIVE STAR review! We are happy to hear that your stay with us was a positive one. We appreciate your feedback and apologized for not having towels in your room we will definitely address this with housekeeping. We hope to see you back soon.  Best Travels Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: The foyer was very nice, but then you get to the rooms and they were a bit dated and a little dingy. The beds were slightly smaller than the usual ( Full vs. Queen) but the sheets and bathroom was clean. The staff was friendly. The breakfast buffet was excellent, had a bit of everything! Plus they had a free shuttle to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Urabum03, Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate your kind words about our staff and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you back again soon.   Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: Construction was going on during our stay so outside appearance will be skipped. Overall the hotel was clean and the staff was very friendly.  The room was good, house keeping did not provide enough (rough) towels but that issue was fixed with a visit to the front desk. They have a nice breakfast spread available.  If you're heading out to Disneyland they have a shuttle service.
Manager Response: Dear dc05092016, Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate your feedback and want to apologized for the inconveniences you did encounter. We are happy to hear you found great value in staying at our hotel and hope to see you back soon. Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front office manager

Summary: Right when we walked into the room, we found a used razor in the shower. My wife and I were dissatisfied with the fact that there was no counter space in the bathroom. The bed was also extremely uncomfortable. The breakfast was the worst we ever had. The gravy tasted like elmers glue. The only positive experience we had was the lady that checked us in was great and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear 715taliag, Thank you for writing a review! We want to apologized if your experience was no a positive one. We want to assure you that your feedback will not be overlooked and we will be addressing these issues.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: Our stay was okay. All we basics did was sleep. It was quiet which is a plus. The shower was gross only because it fill up and that was gross! Breakfast there was a variety but it was not Hot and we got there right around 6:05-6:15.
Manager Response: Dear MichellecR5939DE, Thank you for your review! We are glad to hear you found great value in staying at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback and we will share this information with the department heads. We hope to see you back again soon. Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: Lobby is fantastic, as soon as I got to the elevator I knew I picked the wrong place. Smelled old, furniture was old, shower had mold, shower head was not clean and the faucet pointed to the wall. Very disappointed for what I paid.
Manager Response: Dear shellyc930, Thank you for posting your review! We truly apologize if your experience with us was not a positive one. Please Know within the coming months, our hotel will be undergoing cosmetic and amenity upgrades. We appreciate your feedback. We hope to earn your business again.  Best travels  Frank Zuniga  Front Office Manager

Summary: After a trip through 30 states we got back to CA and stayed at this hotel for a "Happiest Place on Earth" diversion from life. We stayed at dozens of hotels. This hotel was pretty darn great. The buffet was *lovely*. I'm starting to think that hotels are awesome or crummy based on the breakfast they offer. This breakfast was fabulous. And the shuttle was frequent to Disneyland. Totally a good price for a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear rightkindofme, Thank you so much for posting your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet and that your stay was a positive one. We look forward to hosting your next trip!  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  Front office manager

Summary: Rooms are extremely outdated and old! With a bit of a smell to them! No comforters on bed, also found a Roach on one of the beds. Didn't receive house keeping everyday so it was fun to track down towels @ 12am after a long day @ the park! The last evening our AC went out in the room and was very hard to sleep! Definitely wish I spent my money else where!
Manager Response: Dear offerman353, Thank You for posting your review. We work hard on providing the best guest experience possible, we apologize this was not the case with you. We will definitely address the issues listed in your review.  Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com Front Office Manager

Summary: Staff very friendly, spacious clean rooms, quiet, buffet breakfast is spectacular, shuttle services great. My family and I enjoyed the stay in this hotel. In the neighborhood there are many restaurants nearby as well as shops offering excellent deals.
Manager Response: Dear Jose V, Thank You so much for your FIVE STAR review! The Howard Johnson in Fullerton is thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay. We Look Forward to your next visit!  Frank Zuniga  Fzuniga@hojomaingate.com front office manager

Summary: My stay at the Howard Johnson met all expectations and more. A big thank you for the positive experience. Kudos to a great group of staff whom will go above and beyond to see one of the hotels guests needs met. It is impossible to leave without a smile. Beautiful property with a management whom has installed customer service, affordable prices and cleanliness as top priority. Thank you Michelle, Michael, and the rest of the Howard Johnson staff whom made my trip a memory warm felt. In all this hotel is a must for those in the area!
Manager Response: Dear Rick B, Thank You for your five star review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay while with us. We will definitely share your kind words with Michelle and Michael.  We look forward to hosting your next trip! Best travels  Frank Zuniga Fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary Heading: Very nice, great location, great price
Summary: The hotel was visually very nice,  staff were very nice and helpful. The breakfast provided was very delicious . Location was great! 10 minutes from Disneyland, 10 minutes from Anaheim Packing District and less than 5 minute drive from stores like Walmart,  Burlington, and other retail shops.
Manager Response: Dear David V, Thank You For Your Five Star Review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the service level of our staff. We see that you took advantage of our great location close to shopping and dining. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best travels  Frank Zuniga  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: i was skeptical due to review. However the room was great.  There is construction in the morning , so if you want peace and quiet after 9 am forgettaboutit....breakfast was free and bacon was tasty. Tip your server !!  Bed was plush and housekeeping staff superb.    Front desk dropped the ball when I added an extra night.  They called me requesting a credit card number that i had already given them at the front desk the previous night......very inconvinient.    Other than that    Enjoyed the visit !
Manager Response: Dear Q589XVcharlest, Thank You for your five star review! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you took advantage of our breakfast buffet. We appreciate your feedback and we have taken the proper steps necessary so that our mistake does not occur again our most sincere apologies. We look forward to hosting your next trip! Best Travels  Frank Zuniga  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: Lets start with the positives.  First and foremost, the shuttle to and from Disneyland is a HUGE plus. The beds were very comfortable which provided some much needed rest after a few days at Disneyland.  The breakfast in the morning was great, a free hot meal truly helps with costs on a trip like this.  The pool was also very nice on this unusually hot November trip. Now some negatives.... The elevator was EXTREMELY slow.  The rooms were very outdated.  The WIFI was AWFUL basically non-existent. Overall it was a good trip and we would probably stay here again.... especially if the WIFI was fixed......
Manager Response: Dear 209VanillaGorilla, Thank you for your review! We are glad to hear you took advantage of our free shuttle to and from Disneyland. We want to let you know that your feedback will not be overlooked. We hope to see you and your family back again soon.  best travels  frank zuniga  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: Hotel is lcoated at a very convenient place. Very easy access to shopping, restaurants abd highway. The only missing items in room are microwave and fridge.
Manager Response: Dear Fahimullah K, Thank you for your review! We are glad to hear that you took advantage of our great location close to shopping and restaurants. We do have microwaves and refrigerators available upon request for an extra charge we are sorry that we failed to notify you. We look forward to making your next stay a great one we hope to see you soon.   Best Travels Frank Zuniga  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: This hotel was very dirty. We arrived and had blood on our bedding, so we put the blanket on the floor thinking that the housekeeping service would change the sheets the next day. We went to the theme parks and came back to the same bedding back on our beds and the whole room smelt like severe body odor. Would not recommend this hotel to anyone. Only positive was that the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanieh, We are sorry to learn that your experience with our hotel was not what you expected. We make every effort to ensure that we deliver, clean comfortable accommodations. Please know that the issues you mentioned will not be overlooked. We would like the opportunity to earn your business again. Please feel free to contact us at any time.  warm regards  frank zuniga  front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, free shuttle, yummy free breakfast, clean room, comfortable bed!
Summary: I was a little worried reading the reviews when I booked here. We did a short trip to Universal Studios and two days at Disneyland. I asked for a room facing the pool, ( tips section in TA, thanks guys!). Michelle at the front desk told me on the phone she would try but they needed us to check in first. When we got there around 9pm, she was great. She showed us two rooms on the map and let us pick. I really liked our room. 240. We could park right near the back door/elevator to unpack. There was tons of parking, even though they are renovating one building. We only made it to the breakfast one day, it runs from 6-9 am. It is dine in only, so that was a bummer. It was a generous, nice buffet, with yummy stuff. I was impressed. If you are low carb, there are eggs, sausage, bacon,
Manager Response: Dear leave c, Thank you for posting your review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the service level of our staff and will be sure to share this with Michelle. Our unique location and proximity to Disneyland, dining, and shopping is a great advantage and we are glad you noticed. We look forward to seeing you and your family soon.  warm regards  frank zuniga  front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. The buffet breakfast had a great selection. One of the days we were there, my daughter wasn't feeling well. Laura helped get me a special to-go breakfast to take back to the room for her. Thank you for your service!    We also used the free shuttle service to Disneyland every day. A couple of times during our 3-day package he was 15 mins late. But it was available all day every hour until late at night.
Manager Response: Dear Mary K, Thank you for your review! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay while with us. We will definately share your kind words with Laura. We look forward to hosting your next trip!  best travels  frank zuniga  front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: Stayed with a couple of friends one weekend and was one of the only hotels that actually had rooms available. The breakfast was really good and the people working there were very friendly. One coworker in specific "Maria Martinez" went out of her way to make sure I had a good breakfast & kept checking on us to make sure we were okay. Thanks everyone.
clean room, the price is quite right, nice and friendly staff, near to dining and shopping area
Room was clean but in need of updating. Bathroom paint was peeling and the tub stopper was broken. The tv didn't work. However, the beds were comfortable and the continental breakfast ample.

Overall my stay was good.  The hotel is currently being expanded so there is some construction going on but it didn't bother us at all. They need to update the rest of the hotel but it was clean and comfortable.  My only 2 complaints are that some of the breakfast was cold on a couple of the mornings we were there and one evening we came back to the hotel and had to cruise the parking lot waiting for someone to leave so we could park. They had 3 large events going that night and I'm sure they are short some parking with the expansion work. The staff was great and if they update/renovate then I would say it would easily be a 4-5 rating.

Summary Heading: Amazing Breakast, Service, Clean Rooms, Close to Disneyland
Summary: From the moment I checked in, the service I received at this hotel was outstanding.  I requested a room close to the pool and the manager noted that he made sure that request was granted.  Although this is an older hotel, many renovations have been done and the carpet in my room was new.  The concierge desk was very helpful with planning activities in the area and the front desk staff was friendly and professional.  I loved the Disneyland shuttle and the drivers were courteous and professional.  The breakfast at this hotel was incredible.  It looked and felt like I was eating at a nice restaurant (not the typical hotel restaurant breakfast feel).  The food was exceptional.  The internet speed was slow, but that was not a huge factor to my family because we were on vacation.  I

We booked online thru a 3rd party and had a little hiccup when we were checking in. The girls at the front desk were very helpful and friendly. There were 4 of us, 2 adults and 2 kids, and after getting things straightened out, check in was pretty quick.   The main pro in our book was the heated swimming pool, followed by the Disney shuttle, and lastly the free breakfast which was included in our reservation.  As for the cons, upon first entering our room there was a faint musty odor, it wasn't overwhelming but it was definitely noticeable. The room (as well as the hallways) were in desperate need of a deep cleaning or remodel. (Which hopefully will be next, as they are currently remodeling a building on the other side of the pool.) At first glance, the bedding appeared clean,

Summary Heading: Did not feel safe or clean
Summary: Upon checking in the staff were more than accommodating and very helpful. The room we was given was dreadful the hand towels was stained, bathroom was mouldy and the toilet seat was loose. The carpet in the room was actually revolting! I could not walk around in bare feet and did not dare to put my 8 month down.   I did complain at the time and was offered 2 other rooms only to discover they were no better. The security guard escorted me to one room so I could check it only to find stray hairs around the bathtub.  The hotel felt very unsafe and the neighbouring room were smoking and partying till late which I did report and no one did anything about as there were people coming and going constantly from the room with a very strong smell of weed too! Even though it was advertised
Overall experience was great.  Clean room, great breakfast and great location.  Free WIFI and parking.  Price is WORTH IT for the overall value.  Only negative was the TIGHT parking spaces.
Manager Response: Dear vicbituin, We appreciate your Five Star Review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay while with us. We will definitely share your kind words with our staff.  We look forward to hosting your next trip!  best travels frank zuniga  front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: Excellent customer service from the time we walked in to when we left. Everyone from the front desk to housekeeping was very friendly and helpful! Michelle L. greeted us and checked us in. She had no issue with checking us in a little early and even walked us down to the room to make sure it was clean. A guest that was checking in next to me had a problem and was being rude for no reason and she was even very kind to him as well. Michelle also took the time to find us a crib for my son and had it delivered to us right away. She really made our experience along with Dƒìja. Dƒìja was very helpful when we needed assistance with anything. She also, helped me when I left my wallet in the room after we checked out. She took the time to walk me back in the room and helped me look for it.
Manager Response: Dear Ashley V, Thank you for your five star review! We are glad that you noticed Deja and Michelle L and happy to hear that they were able to accommodate you and make your stay extra special.  We strive to have the best customer service in the industry so your feedback is very much appreciated. We hope to see you and your family soon.  best travels  frank zuniga  front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: I stay there for 3 days and I really want to leave the first day I couldn't sleep because cockroaches were all over my bed.  Housekeeping refused to do the service on the first day never came back I have to clean the room .

I came to the hotel with a tour on Oct 17 and stayed for one night. I left my jacket and so when I called, a lady named Deja was nice enough to grab the jacket for me and said I could pick it up whenever. When I checked back in on the 19th, I spoke to Frank at the front desk and he refused to give me my jacket, and rudely suggested me to come the next morning without any reason. Chung Yee Wong the next morning was so nice to us and grabbed the jacket for us and I just really appreciate what he did and wish that Frank had been more willing to help me out.

We booked this hotel on the day as we extended our trip, upon arrival the reception area looked clean and inviting and staff were very welcoming.   The room however was dirty, mould around the shower and on shower head, food left on the carpets, dirty windows, dirt in the TV controller. Breakfast was not pleasant was too busy so had to queue for food and was not topped up.   We did not feel safe in this hotel and moved on after only 1 night. Staff however were very friendly and apologetic and we did receive a refund for the 3 nights stay that we cancelled.

A large group that I am involved with meets at the hotel on a monthly bases for a business meeting and luncheon.  The room is always set up beautifully, per our color requests, and number of tables needed for our meeting. The service we receive is exceptional. The hotel is neat and clean, and is in the process of being upgraded. We feel fortunate to have such a lovely place for our meetings at such a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Dear 210Judith, Thank you for your review! We appreciate the feedback on our meeting spaces and the service you have received. We will be sharing your comments with our banquets team thank you. Hope to see you and your group soon!  best travels frank zuniga front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: It was a beautiful lobby. The staff were so nice. The only negative is that our toilet wasn't working at all. We left notes for the housekeepers , and asked them to fix the toilet, but they never did. But one night I was standing in line in the lobby, but the line was too long. So I was walking out of the hotel, when Ali, the bellman, asked me if anything was wrong. I told him about the toilet. He took down our room number and said, "By the time you come back to your room, I'll have it fixed. And yes, he fixed it. Ali is the best. The breakfast was amazing! I will definatley be coming back! Thank you for the memories!!

We got adjoining rooms for 2 nights, there is ample parking with a parking pass, a 15 minute shuttle to Disney parks and a complimentary warm breakfast with many different options.  The front of house staff were wonderful and very friendly.  Our rooms were clean and well kept.  The bathroom did not have a fan and unless you are willing to pay the extra charges there are no Fridges or Microwaves.  The shower in our room needed a lot of poking and tinkering to get the shower pressure more then a drizzle but the pressure in our other room was fine.    The Cleaning staff were in the hallways vacuuming by 8am, after a long night in the parks and all catching a bad cold bug this was unwelcome by us but at least they are keeping things clean.  When they say 11am check out, they mean

my stays at the howard johnson was beyond my expectations. i could have my 8 month old baby crawling around the hotel if i could, thats how amazingly clean the rooms always are. the maids are beyond excellent and would do anything i requested and left a card with their name and phone number if i had anything else to request. besides the maids, the lobby staff are the most easiest going staff ive ever met, they put so much pride and patience into their job to please their customers. im most pleased with the manager frank, who has done so many favors for me thru my stay. I couldnt ask for better. If you want an awesome service with no complaints, I suggest come here for your stays and besides that they have an awesome breakfast buffet that I forgot to mention.. Even my 8 month old

I have spent much time in the past at this hotel with good experience.  Unfortunately, I was not able to get the room location that I desired this time as the hotel tower was under renovation.  Also this time, my room was located next to a meeting room which proved to be a little more noisy.   The breakfast menu is very good and the hotel has a very good location to nearby shops, restaurants, and the train station.  I believe the value was very good!
Manager Response: Dear Ronald D, Thank you for your review! We are truly happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and took advantage of our great location. We are constantly looking to do upgrades both to our public areas and rooms, we appreciate your feedback. We look forward to your next visit.  frank zuniga  front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary Heading: Ok if it's just to sleep
Summary: Staff was great cleaning staff was not left garbage in room when it clearly was garbage front hallway in lobby smelled
Manager Response: Dear paullg6998WS, Thank you for taking your time to write a review! We appreciate your feedback and will address this issue with our housekeeping staff. We apologized for not meeting your expectations if you wish to further discuss your experience please feel free to contact us at the email provided.  best travels  frank zuniga  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com front office manager

Summary Heading: Not expecting such a nice room for this price and close to Disney
Summary: We were visiting grandkids and needed a "middle location".  The staff, accomondations and breakfast were all great.  Thank You!  It is convenient to a lot and there were nearby shopping and groceries, restaurants and whatever.  The room was found for about $75 Wow!
Manager Response: Dear teeorski, Thank You for your five star review! We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our great location close to shopping and restaurants. We will be sharing your review with our staff. We hope to see you soon and thank you for choosing us as your "middle location."  best travels  frank zuniga  front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: Lobby was clean got s good vibe walking in. Customer services was okay. But once you pass the lobby the hallways are dirty and run down looking not to mention the room was horrible looking.  Once it was time for bed half the bed was collapsed. Call front desk to let them know but fell on dead ears. So disappointed with ur stay.  If it wasn't so late I would of checked out.

Conveniently located near the freeway,  shopping, etc.  The lobby was beautiful,  but once I got upstairs the smell of mildew was pretty overpowering. The room size was very comfortable,  but it's in need of maintenance. Beds are pretty wiggly too.  If someone moves everyone moves.

No problems. Room was clean and had shuttle to Disneyland. Breakfast was great, good variety of hot and cold food and the coffee was very good. I would stay there again. It was quiet and check in was very simple.
Manager Response: Thank You for your five star review! We are glad that you took advantage of our free shuttle to and from Disneyland. We appreciate your feedback on our breakfast and we will share it with our staff. We look forward to seeing you and your family soon.  best travels frank zuniga front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay at Howard Johnson Fullerton,CA
Summary: This was a very nice hotel to stay at, very friendly and helpful staff, great location near shopping, clean room and a very full breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Robert C,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. I see that you took advantage of our great location near shopping and restaurants. We hope to see you soon.   Best travels  Frank zuniga front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: I will make this my number one choice every time I need to get a room. I enjoy the breakfast buffet , staff is very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Marshas985, Thank You for your 5 star review! We are glad that you enjoyed your recent stay and we look forward to seeing you soon. Our staff strives to give the best guest experience we will share your feedback with them.  best travels frank zuniga front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: Booked hotel online. There was no wording on the website that they were renovating the hotel. Breakfast hours should be 6-10:30 not 6-9. I stayed in room 154 that was at the end close to the parking lot. They lock the gate at 10pm. So the walk from the front of the hotel was ridiculous. I wont stay at that property again. Norma my maid was very awesome.

I stayed at Howard Johnson a month ago now, it is clean and staff are friendly. If anything is wrong with your room you can mention it to that manager and within that day the problem is fixed. They are doing renovations so half the parking is blocked off and you can tell the hotel needs some work. But, otherwise it is worth your money to stay at this hotel. They have wifi but it is really slow.

My family and I checked into the Howard Johnson August 20th. Since then the staff has been professional, polite and happy to assist in our requests. The rooms are spacious, clean, and the beds are comfortable. Breakfast is delicious! Marlene makes sure we leave the breakfast area with a smile everyday. She is a wonderful asset to the hotel and an exceptional employee. Because of staff like Marlene will will definitely be extending our stay here!
Manager Response: Dear Eugenia b,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review! We are happy to hear that your stay was great. We will be sharing your feedback with Marlene. We hope to see you soon.   best travels frank zuniga front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary Heading: Average stay at this Ho Jo.
Summary: Stayed here as I had a work event nearby.  Thanks to the NICE front desk supervisor we were able to check in an hour early. The first front desk attendant wasn't the most pleasant person to deal with so this was a nice save by the gentleman.  The Pool was nice and big. Properly heated. Great big breakfast in the AM.  Always a good option for budget stay in the area.

Summary Heading: Maybe once the renovation is completed??
Summary: I can't say the place is great, I can't say the place is awul. Pluses: the late night staff was lovely, the beds are comfy and the rooms are spacious, clean and quiet. Minuses: the morning staff seemed put off my very presence at the checkout desk, the rooms haven't received the same remodel attention as the lobby, there's one elevator for several floors of rooms. The lobby is stunning, and then just past the lobby as you head to find your room it becomes exactly what you expect from a "ho-jo's". So, maybe once it's finished it can get a fair review, right now I can just say thank you for a perfect night's sleep.

We go out of town a lot but this hotel is a little run down not as clean as I would have liked. We don't need much just a clean place to sleep and shower. I felt itchy when in the room. the towels had holes and the bed was not very comfortable. There is a free breakfast but everything was cold and not very good. It looks like they are remodeling one of the towers (under construction) so things may be changing for the better but not at the time of our stay.  I don't think we will be staying again, this was a last minute trip but there are other hotels closer to our destination (Disneyland) that are in the same price range.
The hotel was in a good location was clean the staff was helpful and the breakfast in the morning was more than good.  It meet our expectations we would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Kade H,  Thank you for your review! Our staff strives to exceed guest expectations and we are happy to hear this from you. We look forward to seeing you and your family in the near future.   best travels frank zuniga  front office manager  fzuniga@hojomaingate.com

Summary: Plus: big rooms, clean, good breakfast, very good location (lots of stores and restaurants nearby/relatively short drive yo Disney) , very nice staff Cons: outdated, undergoing renovations   We were there for two nights and were mostly away at the theme parks.
Manager Response: Dear linajesuyo  Thank you so much for your review! We are pleased to hear that you took advantage of our free shuttle to and from Disneyland. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Usually I am not to hard to please but this place was terrible. The staff was nice and the breakfast was good but those are the only two good things I could say about this place. The beds were doubles but seemed like a twin. The room was outdated and carpet was dirty. We stayed two nights and the room was never cleaned and we were never given new towels. It looks terrible on the outside and inside. We even had a decent price on it but it still was not worth saving the money. Would not recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Joel H Thank you for the valuable feedback. We have always valued our guest feedback on their experience. Please know that within the coming months, our hotel will be undergoing cosmetic and amenity upgrades. Please look out for more information on our exciting new offerings.   best travels  frank z

Summary: My reservations through mileage points we're relayed incorrect. We were stuck in a king bed room with 3 travelers when a double room was requested.  Fornt desk wouldn't help to get us a double room.  Hotel was worn down, old, stinky. Our air conditioner kept going out in the room Making it hot and uncomfortable  The only nice part of our stay was the pool.

We choose this hotel bcuz it was close to Disneyland. The place was clean, staff friendly, yet i believe ignorant about some of their reward systems. Also you have to leave a refundable deposit for the room. If you use credit card or debit its $75 & takes several days to refund. If you use cash, its $100. The morning you check out they check your room, only to make sure nothing is missing or broken. Then you get your cash back. However, i had difficulty getting my cash back. I used reward points for my stay and i guess this confused the staff. They kept saying i was charged $35 for something, they didnt know what and were going to take it out of my $100. I told her it was the cost of my room. So i pulled up my app to show her the remainder of the price, minus the rewards -

Summary Heading: Mushroom Growing out of bathroom baseboard
Summary: This hotel is evidently going through a remodel...but it is completely disgusting at this time. The hallway carpet and area is dirty and the actual room was filthy - the carpet is stained and dirty, funky smell in the room, the couch in the room is disgusting, and the topper was the mushroom I found growing out of the wall between the toilet and tub. I will still keep this hotel as my 4th choice in the Fullerton area AFTER they get the remodel done, but to see families staying here during their Disneyland trip was a bit disturbing. I was traveling solo for business, but would have immediately moved out if I had my family with me. Staff was professional and very courteous.
friendly service, nice location close to Disneyland and store and restaurant. swimming pool is great and the size room size is good.
Manager Response: Dear Robert O T   Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We strive to provide and experience that is above industry standards. We look forward to your next visit.   best travels  Frank Z

Summary: This is the worst inn ever„ÄÇFirst day arriving at the inn. i ask the front desk do you have wi-fi they told me they have.after i got into my room trying to connect it fail. i call the front 2days already still not working What kind of inn ÔºÅ No WiFiÔºüÔºüÔºü

The hotel wasn't far from Disneyland. Not in walking distance, but only maybe 15 minutes away. Lots of parking and fast check in. Comfortable bed and each guest had a free huge breakfast buffet coupon. That alone saved about 10.00 per person.
Manager Response: Hello jjnlina,   Thank you for the 5 Star review! We are thrilled that we delivered what you expected! Our proximity to the Disney Parks makes it very convenient to stay with us as well as park your car here for free and take the complimentary Anaheim Shuttle.   We'll be sure to share your  feedback with the Breakfast Team  and your compliments on the Buffet.   We look forward to having you back as our Guest.

Summary: This was my third stay at this hotel. Mr. Frank Zuniga was the person who checked me in. He was professional, kind and went out of his way to print my e-tickets and directions to the Santa Ana Airport. I appreciated this very much. All the hotel staff I came in contact with were outstanding. The room was very clean and comfortable. The breakfast was delicious. I plan on being back in the area in the near future and I will definitely stay at this hotel. It is the best value for the money.
Manager Response: Hello thebluejewel,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us; our Team works hard to ensure all of are Guests  enjoyed their stay just like you did.   Thank you for recognizing Frank and our Housekeeping Team. We will be sure to share your great review with the entire Hotel.   Thank you again and we can't wait to have you back as our Guest.

Summary Heading: Manager at the front was awesome!
Summary: I arrived at the property late on a Thursday night. When I approached the front desk, I was told that my reservation was not in the system. I had made my reservation through booking.com. The manager quickly called booking.com and told them the situation so that they could resolve it. Booking.com was not being very helpful. Finally the manager cancelled their reservation and booked me in himself through their hotel system. It also turned out to be cheaper anyways. Frank did a great job. Rooms were decent and well kept. AC got nice and cold. I enjoyed the hotel.
Manager Response: Greetings joshuahF8632EO,   Thank  you for taking the time  share the  positive experience you had with your Front Desk Team;  they work diligently to ensure that our Guests are  completely satisfied.   We have happy to know that you enjoyed your accommodations as well as the  Service Team.   We can't wait to have you  back as our Guest on your next trip to the Anaheim/Fullerton area.

Summary: Overall hotel was descent for the price. Bathroom doors were worn out and floors dirty but not bad service.
Great hotel, close to Disney, with AWESOME breakfast... Only negative is the beds are too small. Clean rooms though, warm pool kids loved.
Manager Response: Greetings craigstevenp2016, Thank you for taking the time to share the positive experience you had while staying with us. We'll be sure to share your feedback with the breakfast team and your compliments on the buffet. We look forward to having you back as our guest.

Summary: The best hotel we've been! Rooms are clean, all staffs are friendly and professional. Location as well is so quiet, accessible to all restaurants of choice! We love the continental breakfast .
Manager Response: hello corazonf311, thank you for the 5 star review! We are thrilled that we delivered what you expected! Our proximity to shopping center and various dinning options makes it convenient for all our guest during their stay. Thank you again and we can't wait to have you back as our guest.

Summary: Room was not clean..except pillowcase rest were not clean. No exhaust in bathroom  Bathroom door lock was broken

I would say the one redeeming factor of my stay was the pool. Other than that, my overall experience was pretty mediocre.   Positives:  - Location was decent!
