Had a room Close to the freeway and had to leave the air and tv on to drown out the noise. Hotel could use a good coat of paint and new carpets inside, would make a world of difference. Down there this time during the earthquake and everything held up fine. We will be staying here again in June.

This place was by far the worse place we've ever stayed. Its filthy dirty, very very outdated, you can hear everything in the hall and rooms next-door. The workers are nice and the shuttle to Disney are good but didn't make up for the crappy crappy hotel. Oh, the complimentary breakfast made us sick the first day so we never went back. Horrible horrible horrible can't even describe this place.
Rooms fairly old, but all was fairly clean and functional. Free full breakfast was good and saved $.

Good price ($97/night) for families visiting Disneyland. They have heated pool, the free shuttle, kids stay for free, included breakfast...price was fair...a little loud during the night because of the wedding in the ball room...front-desk was helpful. Breakfast was good but same thing every morning. We will come back!

Summary Heading: The room was not cleaned,and we had to ask for wash clothes...
Summary: The room was not cleaned,and we had to ask for wash clothes and hand towels every day. The toilet seat was broken and we ask to have it fixed several times. Breakfast was cold and a poor selection. The shuttle busses were not in great shape and we thought they would break down. Would never stay here again.

Checked into a room late brought my family's stuff up got the kids settled into bed when to shower and noticed a dirty tub full of water backed up would not drain. The throw pillows had blood on them, the head board had dried up white stuff the blanket had a sticker off of a previous guests clothing  the carpet was filthy my socks were dirty walking on it. Staff did not send someone the next morning to clean shower so we could leave out in the morning I had to call a couple times and finally housekeeping came and did the shower  but did not fix anything else I had to clean the headboard and we used our own pillows. They had a party going on one night and we couldn't find parking it was ridiculous! Will never stay there again and not recommending to my family who travels

Took my family on a 4 day 3night vacation out to Disneyland and searched for a good hotel, found Howard Johnson Fullerton and decided to give it a try and pay the extra money for good service. But let me tell you the housekeeping stole my wifes new pair of shoes that were still in the box, I contacted the manager named Franciscu Silva and he was very rude and did nothing to help resolve the issue at all. I would've been happy if he gave me a credit for one night to compensate for the shoes but he did not do anything to make me (the customer) happy. I will let everyone I know that goes on vacation to avoid Howard Johnson Fullerton. On a side note the beds were comfy and the breakfast was good.
Rooms were in need of carpet cleaning, the poor ventilation in the bathrooms created a humid, moldy room!!

Summary Heading: Hotel needs updated furnishings in rooms and hotel overall...
Summary: Hotel needs updated furnishings in rooms and hotel overall, very outdated.  NOT clean!! Employee's working at front desk were friendly but house keeping staff were not and need training on how to clean rooms. would not stay here again! Free shuttle to Disneyland but the driver was never on time with the shuttle schedule.  Shuttle bus was sketchy...

Summary Heading: Our hotel stay was good. We only needed to have a place to...
Summary: Our hotel stay was good. We only needed to have a place to sleep while spending a day at the Disneyland resort. This hotel was very close to the resort.  The king size bed was very comfortable and the room was spacious. We noticed that the outside and the lobby area was undergoing renovation and it did not affect our stay.
First room had pubic hair and "stuff" on the top of the night stand. Jam smeared on the front. Bathroom mirror was totally scummy. Bathtub gad old pieces of soap in it. Moved to another room, was ok.

There are two buildings on the property, one new, one really really old, so old the door to your room is 3/4 size of a regular door and obviously when you get a room online thru kayak you get the small door'd dirty room in the back without wifi, not the new ones in the new section.  The parking lot in back was dark and scary right next to some scary apartment complex so don't leave anything in your car. On the plus side the breakfast buffet that came with room had real scrambled eggs not microwaved.  And they put a $75 hold on your card even though you pre paid the room to make sure you don't smoke in a hotel and hallways that ALL SMELLS LIKE CIGARETTES...

Summary Heading: Poor room appearance, poor air quality, terrible breakfast, outdated room
Summary: Poor room appearance, poor air quality, terrible breakfast, outdated room. poor value for your money

Against our advice, friends stayed at the Howard Johnson Fullerton and we went to pick them up.  Again you have to navigate the parking lot to avoid the Chinese tour buses and people standing around in the middle of the lot with their suitcases.    And the rooms are still the same: dismal.  I cannot for the life of me understand why anybody would choose to stay there when almost every other alternative is better -- both in terms of quality and economics.

Staff was friendly, professional, and courteous as always!!  I ALWAYS stay here when I travel to the Los Angeles Area. No matter what the reason for my trip, I stay here. Starting back when this was a Wyndham, to Anaheim Park Hotel, and now the HJ.
The service was good; the room was good; the location is excellent; breakfast was included with the room, but I would have preferred the IHOP nearby, because it has a better variety.
Location was good but hotel is old...needs to be updated. Bathroom and carpet filthy. Fixtures in shower look like they are falling apart and are the original shower heads

Average hotel for the price paid. Shuttle service is not very convient for going to disneyland, was easier to drive and park. Shuttle has no service from 12-4. Free buffet breakfast is average, could have more variety from day to day.

Summary Heading: dirty no security doors working left open. no room key was...
Summary: dirty no security doors working left open. no room key was needed to open any security doors. staff friendly no restaurant. morning free breakfast poor selection, cold very very selection of food

Summary Heading: Place was okay. No ice bucket in room, called for one said...
Summary: Place was okay. No ice bucket in room, called for one said would send one up waited 15-20 minutes walked to front desk said they didn't have them up front and someone would bring one up... No one ever came, wine never got chilled or opened. So much for relaxing night away from home and the kids.  Free breakfast served until 9:00 am. After waiting up for ice bucket forever and disagreeing about the situation we missed breakfast. Not the best experience

Overall, the stay at Howard Johnson Fullerton Hotel and Conference Center was satisfactory. Really enjoyed the shuttle service to/from the Disneyland Resort. The complimentary breakfast was good as well.

Summary Heading: THIS PLACE SHOULD BE  CLOSED AND REMODELED !!  DO NOT GO THERE!!
Summary: I arrive Feb 13 I booked 2 nights through Bookit.com it was $69 per night plus free wi fi. Free breakfast free shuttle to disney. I have booked throught them before and and payed similar price for a hotel with similar amenities in vegas ....which i was awsome for the value and super clean. When i saw this Offer i did not hesitate to book!  BIG MISTAKE we arrived at hotel and i felt as. If i was in a movie from a horror film it was dark and nasty and empty. As i pulled up to check in i could not help but notice the disney shuttle buses which by the way looked like a old lunch truck with disney characters . But I really did not mind that . I walk to concierge and lobby smelled like mold and it looked dirty . Staff was really nice sweet and helpful. We get our room key we are

This hotel is decent for travelers who are there to go to Disneyland as you will spend most of the day out of the room anyway.  This is not a resort by any means, but it will do especially for the price.  The breakfast buffet was also a plus.  Overall there were no complaints from our party at all.
Manager Response: Hello Teresa O,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review about our hotel.  We thank you for being honest about our condition, we pride ourselves in providing a great value hotel and we strive to provide the best service possible.  We thank you for your honest opinion and it is our hope that you choose our hotel should you return to the Fullerton area.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: First Room Dirty!!! Second room clean...
Summary: Was assigned to a dirty!!!! DIRTY ROOM!!!! There was hair all over the back of toilet and bathroom, towels on the floor and room floor wasnt vacuum at all... I was very mad since we arrived on friday around 12AM n with my 2 year old.. I asked for another room but since my son was sleeping and I'm currently 31 weeks pregnant I decided to stay in that room since we had all our stuff already there and sons crib etc.. did report it right away to front desk, she apologized and offer another room which I had to wake up at 6am to go get the keys front desk before her shift was over. .. ok I did not sleep at all with all the noise and door slamming all night long!! Did I mention the halls smelled someone was smoking weed and is supposed to be a non smoking hotel... as soon as we got the
Manager Response: Hello J M,  First of all my apologies for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel, our staff strives to provide the best accommodations possible  and I am sorry and disappointed on our staff for giving you a dirty room.  I will make sure that these incidents to not happen to our future guests.  We have contacted you about your glasses and left voice mail messages.  Thank you for taking the time and writing a detail message I will make sure that everyone in our hotel reads it so we can fine tune our operations and provide the level of service that our valuable guests deserve.  We hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Dirt on pillows and comforters upon arrival, as if they had been dropped outside, day 3 ripped sheet on bed. Ratty torn towels. What looked like feces on batroom floor. Bathroom vent looked like it is never dusted or cleaned. Broken ice machine covered in bird feces. Security gates do not lock. Breakfast awful. Tv kept going out and had bad spots in picture. Staff was very rude. Could not give daughter a bath because the water got too hot and you could not turn down hot/turn up cold. Cleaning staff Left trash in room yet threw out an item that was not trash. Sunglasses disappeared from room.
Manager Response: Hello Raymond G,  I would like to apologize for a bad stay at our hotel.  I would like to make it up to you please call our hotel and speak to me personally.  Our staff is well trained to make sure that if you are not 100% satisfied with your room we will change your room, fix and clean any item until you are satisfied with your accommodations.  We appreciate your feedback as it helps us with training of staff to better our operations for our future guests.  We appreciate your comments and it is our hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: needs better food choices on the breakfast buffet. Otherwise, this is a great value that is conveniently located.
Manager Response: Hello Jo D,  Thank you for choosing the Howard Johnson Fullerton and thank you for your feedback.  We are delighted to know that you feel that our hotel was a great value.  Our staff takes pride in their work and they are ready to deliver the level of service that our guests deserve.  Yes we are centrally located and very close to some of the most famous venues in the area.  We are only 15 minutes away from Disneyland, California Adventure, Honda Center to name a few.  We appreciate your feedback and I will pass on your review to our F&B manager for future consideration.   Thank you for staying with us and it would be our pleasure to serve you in your future visits to the area.  Sincerely,  Roberto Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Purchased on Groupon.  Otherwise, I would have left! Huge mistake run down hotel from hell. Bedding, blankets and spread dirty. Toilet seat was bubbled and stained yellow. Room smelled of mildew, due to the lack of a bathroom fan. Doesn't replenish soaps nor provide a dirty laundry bag. TV received about 5 stations with no guide. Could here the people all around: talking, yelling, flushing toilets, showers, etc. Scared to touch anything or walk around without shoes pure gross! The owner should be embarrassed to run a hotel of that nature. Luckily, I drove to Disneyland each day. There shuttle reflected the hotel so did the breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello Casafamily07,  First of all my apologies for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel and I am sorry that we were not able to make it up to you.  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  I am embarrassed to hear a comment like yours after a guest has checked out and knowing that our staff could have made things better for you.  I will be talking to my staff to make sure that our future guests do not experience this kind of conditions in a room.  Please know that our staff is well trained to provide an alternative if you are not happy with your room.  We normally find a room to your satisfaction or if available we will upgrade you at no extra charge.  As always we appreciate your honest opinion and we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Just a so-so experience. Staff was friendly and helpful. Hotel was quiet. Beds were comfy. Found the room a bit grungy, though. Moldy bathroom, coverlets had smears on them. Breakfast was quite decent.
Manager Response: Hello Susan R,  Thank you for your review on our hotel.  As always we appreciate honest opinions from our guests.  Thank you for mentioning that our staff was friendly and helpful and that our hotel is quiet and beds comfortable.  I have addressed all the issues that you mentioned with our housekeeping department.  We appreciate your feedback and it is our hope that you choose our hotel for your future stays.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We arrived at the Howard Johnson Fullerton with apprehension as the neighborhood appeared unsafe and dirty, we were given false hope by the appearance of the lobby and the friendly staff at the front desk, but unfortunately were quickly frighten by the dirty and broken condition of the hotel hall ways, stairways, elevator, hotel rooms and bathrooms; the hotel should be condemned as it poses a health hazard to its tenants and staff. We found cockroaches and red ants, dirty gray towels, smelly and dirty bedding in both both rooms we rented; every inch of the place smells like smoke and mildew. I urge the owners to clean up their act and give a care about what they are selling and Howard Johnson to drop this place as part of their network. The best thing that happened to us on our
Manager Response: Helo Jose P,  I am very sorry that you had a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  Thank you for mentioning that our lobby was nice and that our front desk staff was friendly.  I apologize for the inconvenience I will pass on your comment to ownership to consider future enhancements to the property.  As always we appreciate your comments and we hope that you consider giving us a second chance in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Serious remodeling needed as the wallpaper was literally falling, old furnishings and tv, dirty carpet, in essence, very dissapointed.
Manager Response: Hello Miguel S,  Thank you for taking the time and write a review on our hotel.  As always your feedback is appreciated, I am very sorry that you were disappointed on our hotel.  I hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better.  Thank you for your honest opinion, we use this feedback to fine tune our operations and provide the highest level of service that our guests deserve.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Stayed here 3 days to hit Disney. Pros: free direct shuttle to Disney, shopping/restaurants within walking distance, buffet hot breakfast (not just cereal), heated pool for kids. Was perfect for us, as we just mostly slept there & then hit Disney. Very friendly, helpful staff. Clean. Easy freeway access. Cons: family Disney hotel - can be noisy early am, eves...but that worked for us. Some things could use updating, but nothing too bad.  Overall - great value for a Disney trip!
Manager Response: Hello David O,  Thank you for choosing the Howard Johnson Fullerton and thank you for your review.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you had a great stay at our hotel.  Our hotel is committed to provide great accommodations and great customer service.  Thank you for mentioning the pros and cons of our property so our future guests know what how our hotel really is like from a guest‚Äôs perspective.  I appreciate your detailed review and I hope that you choose our hotel for your future stays.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: -No internet or very slow. -Shuttle overcrowded; feels like a third world country. Bad shape; heater didn't work, Schedules changes at the last minute without announcement. -The wall paper was tear down in some walls. -Restaurant: A mix or patches of several styles from 60's, 70's, 80's; eclectic? More like a tacky patched blanket; It just hurt the dignity.  -Key cards: two times had to be changed because they didn't work. -More as a vacational place, It felt like I was begging for a cheap, rusty hotel for homeless tourists.  -One can tell because of the size of the property and some of the decor that it was a great place 50 years ago; but that's it, the hotel stayed like that, frozen in time with some failed makeup patching fixes according to the era; As an owner of that
Manager Response: Hello Jairo F,  Thank you for choosing the Howard Johnson Fullerton and thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I would like to apologize for not providing a pleasant stay to you and your family.  I have addressed all of the issues that you have mentioned with our management team and we will make sure that our future guests do not have a negative experience.  We appreciate your detailed feedback as it helps us improve our operations and provide a better stay for our future guest.    Thank you for your comments and it is our hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: This hotel seemed like it should be a lot nicer than it was, and maybe we just got an unfortunate hiccough, but both of our rooms (the first covered in mold before they moved us) weren't very clean. The lobby, breakfast spot, and other common areas were great. The breakfast itself was one of the nicest I've had at a hotel. But we had to call multiple times throughout the day to get issues resolved, even when they kept saying they would call right back or be right there, and our keys kept deactivating. That said, when things were finally taken care of the workers were helpful and friendly. Bugs, mold, weird smells, and things like hair on the sink and in the tub (not ours) weren't appreciated.
Manager Response: Hello David L,  Thank you for taking the time and tell us about your stay at our hotel.  I am very sorry that our team failed to provide a memorable stay at our hotel.  We know that our hotel as some issues and we have a team that will respond immediately to your needs.  Thank you for mentioning that our staff was helpful and friendly and that you enjoyed our breakfast.  I will make sure that in the future our team is able to resolve issues to your satisfaction before moving on.  As always your feedback is appreciated and we hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: The hotel is in very poor condition.The room had black mold...
Summary: The hotel is in very poor condition.The room had black mold in the bathroom.The walls were separating in the bathroom.The floors looked dirty.The elevator had holes where they had moved the picture but they left the holes unfilled.The area going onto the elevator was dirty enough that I thought it was a service elevator-paint was removed,alot of black marks on the threshold,and walls.The ice machines were all broken.But the front desk staff were friendly.The free breakfast was cold and the pits...
Manager Response: Hello Gail L,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on our hotel.  I appreciate your detailed feedback as we use it to train our staff to do a better job for our future guest.  We have a team of committed employees that do a great job to provide great accommodations.  Thank you for mentioning that our front desk staff was friendly, I will sure let them know that they are providing great customer service.  Again we appreciate your comments and it is our hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I was stuck in the elevator with 2 kids and 5 adults for over 20 minutes. The management never check on us or apologize. Breakfast was mediocre at best. There was no coffee in the lobby and the room coffee was terrible. This is a very old building and it shows. Ordered pizza from Broadway Pizza listed on a card on my room.WORST. PIZZA. EVER. Even the children could'nt eat it. NO hot tub. It was boarded over. Heated pool was not even warm.
Manager Response: Hello Lonnie A,  I would like to apologize to you and your family for a bad experience with the elevator and I am sorry that management did not reach out to you to see how you were doing.  However, I did an extensive research about why management was not notified about this incident and I was not able to find a report of anyone getting stuck in the elevator.  We take these incidents very serious and believe me everyone in the hotel would have known this information.  Please accept my sincere apology for the quality of the coffee and for the pizza delivered to you we will reconsider our advertisement.  Thank you for your review and we hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: This hotel was not a good experience. The price was very good, but there are several areas in the hotel that needed to be cleaned. It just didn't give you a good feeling. Had to re use dirty towels because our room was not cleaned one of the days. This hotel really just needs to be remodeled and cleaned better.
Manager Response: Hello Kevin Y,  First of all my apologies for not providing a good experience at our hotel, please know that we are committed to delivering great customer service and great accommodations.  I apologize if you had to re use dirty towels, we always have fresh towels when guests ask for them.  We thank you for your feedback and we will use it to better serve our future guest.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Place was filthy.  Breakfast was horrible.  Customer service was no help.  Would never eeevvvveeerrr come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Edward S,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor.  I would like to apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  Our team at the Howard Johnson Fullerton is committed to deliver a great experience, your review will help us provide a better experience to our future guests.    Thank you for your review and I hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: The rooms were old and needed a really good scrubbing. The...
Summary: The rooms were old and needed a really good scrubbing. The breakfast was not good at all and wasn't very big. Proprty wasn't kept up at all. Wasn't close to disneyland and the free shuttle stopped picking up before the park even closed so if u missed it you had to take a 30 dollar cab back to the hotel. I wouldn't recommend this hotel for families doing a disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: Hello Theodoro S,  I want to thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay at our hotel.  I would like to apologize for a less than pleasant stay.  We have a great cleaning team that does a great job so if you ever feel that your room needs extra scrubbing please let the front desk know and we will make sure to keep your room up to your satisfaction.  Our breakfast is basic you can see a picture of it at hojomaingate.com and see all the items that we offer.  I am sorry if you had to pay an expensive cab ride back to the hotel they normally tend to be only $15.00 dollars.  From December 24th until January 3rd our last shuttle left Disneyland 15 minutes after midnight.  I appreciate your feedback and it is our hope that you reconsider our hotel for your future stays.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We spent Christmas here with an overall positive experience.  We really enjoyed the breakfast buffet. As far as room for improvement,  the hotel did not disclose a required 20% deposit upon arrival for "incidentals," which was a little inconvenient after traveling clear across the country thinking everything was paid for. The 2nd improvement suggestion is to extend your shuttle service to coincide with the Disneyland park hours. We ended up utilizing a taxi (approx $15 per trip) both nights just so we could enjoy the night events (world of color and fantazmic along with the fireworks). Finally, the hotel advertises wifi as a room amenity, but it was poor to non-existent in our 7th floor room.
Manager Response: Hello TB,  Thank you for staying at the Howard Johnson Fullerton and thank you for your tips on how we can improve.  I will make sure that our front desk staff discloses the 20% authorization, they should have done it and I apologize if this created an inconvenience to you.  Our Disneyland shuttle is usually set according to Disneyland hours, December is a month when Disneyland has extended hours and sometime we can't keep up with them due to labor cost.  The wifi has a limit in bandwidth, this is done purposely to spread equal share though the hotel.  Our wifi internet has been tested to work very well with email, web surfing and various other applications.  You will experience a hiccup if you are watching a movie due to the large volume of bandwidth required to download a movie or video.  I appreciate your detailed review and it is our hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We stopped here on our way to Disneyland and were certainly glad we were there for only 1 night.  The place is in terrible need of renovation - not clean carpets and basically dirty.  The doors are peeling - the bathroom tile was not clean and the floor grout was dirty.   The free breakfast was probably the worst we have ever had in our many years of travel.   We drink decaf coffee and they told us that they didn't have any and when I asked a manager I was told they were going to make us some - less than a minute later they showed up with a carafe of supposedly "decaf" coffee - there was no way they had time to brew it so I assumed they just put regular coffee in the carafe and told us it was decaf...   that could have been very dangerous for myself so I did not touch it.
Manager Response: Hello hlthee,  I am very sorry that your stay with our hotel was less than pleasant.  I will forward your review to ownership to consider future improvements to the hotel.  I have investigated on your concern about the decaf coffee.  I found out that the coffee was put away already because it was closing time.  This will never happen again and they will be leaving the coffee out until it is gone.  I appreciate your feedback and please accept my sincere apology.  Thank you for your review.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: This is my hotel of choice when I go to Disneyland.  All the staff is really friendly and I enjoy the free warm breakfast in the morning.  This was my third stay and they have all met my expectations.
Manager Response: Hello Ana E,  We want to thank you for your review.  We are glad that you had a great stay and that you enjoyed the amenities of our hotel.  We are very delighted to know that we have become your hotel of choice when visiting the area.  Our team strives to provide great customer service, clean and comfortable rooms and a great experience.  We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back on your next visit.   Thank you for choosing the Howard Johnson Fullerton and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Among all the Howard Johnson Inn I have stayed in, this is the most disappointed one. My room is face to the free way, so I can hear the noise from free way in the mid night. The staff seems not friendly because they never smile. Also, the room is very old and sheets looks like not very clean. I would say it is even worse than a small motel. The only thing they have advantage maybe the free shuttle bus to the Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Lujing Z,  I want to thank you for taking the time and write a review about your stay with us.  I am very sorry that your stay was not to your satisfaction.  We try to accommodate guest on rooms not facing the freeway but if the hotel is full it becomes difficult to change rooms, at any case you should have asked the front desk to change you from rooms.  I am sorry if the amenities were not up to standard and I am glad that you feel that our shuttle service is of good value to our guest.  I thank you for your feedback and we hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Dim creepy corridors. Upon entering the room, carpet had funny stains, furniture is antique (in a bad way) and bedsheets just old and so overused. Walls and ceiling badly needs a fresh coat of paint. No hot water flask/coffee maker or complementary bottled water.
Manager Response: Hello tylermus,  First of all my apologies for providing a less than satisfactory stay at our hotel, our team thrives to provide the best service possible.  I will pass on your review to ownership to consider future investments to our hotel.  I am very surprise that your room did not have a coffee maker.  Our housekeeping team makes sure that all the rooms have a clean coffee maker and an adequate amount of coffee and tea pouches with all the condiments.  I will make sure that our housekeeping supervisors are 100% sure that this is provided to our guests.  We thank you for your review and we hope that you consider our hotel for your future stays.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Had a problem with online reservations. Spoke with the manager. He corrected it but still booked me for the wrong date. Fixed it again. Thank you. Promised upgraded room. Great thx. Checked in. Got same room no upgrade. Thx again.  Room and bathroom were dirty. Beer cans on the balcony.  Had to have key cards programmed 3 times. Finally they sent some on to look at the lock. Staff was pleasant. Will not stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Roger P,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I apologize for the confusion on your reservations, it shows that your reservations was a no show and we gave you credit for a future reservation.  I am sorry if the room was not of your complete satisfaction, our team failed to offer you another room after all your troubles.  I will make sure that these incidents will not happen to our future guests.  I appreciate your feedback and it is our hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: After a long day @ Disneyland, I thought I would sleep like a baby. However, the noice from the freeway kept me up all night. I would recommend anyone who plan to stay here get a room on the opposite side from the freeway.  Also, the roll away bed was a joke. I got it for my son but it was NOT in a condition for anyone to sleep in comfortably. Got to give them credit though that they didn't charge me for it when I compliant and rejected it.
Manager Response: Hello Santi A,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel for your travel needs.  I would like to apologize for providing a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  We do have rooms that overlook the freeway but if the noise becomes a problem we will happily change you to a room that is comfortable to you.  I will make sure to look into the condition of our rollaway bed.  Again we thank you for your comments as we will use them to better our operations so we can provide better service.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The beds were way too small. I could not believe my only options were two DOUBLE beds or one king. With my family of four the one king would not work at all and this is the only hotel that I have visited that used double beds instead of queen size beds. The decor, carpets, bathroom fixtures made me feel like I was staying at a Supper 8 not a Howard Johnson. Our room, 422, also looks like the ceiling is leaning in the far left corner as well as the wall paper is peeling.
Manager Response: Hello Demitri G,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay at our hotel.  I would like to apologize for not providing a satisfactory stay.  You are 100% correct, our hotel rooms consist of rooms with either one king bed or two double beds.  After various request for larger beds we have added a few rooms with a king and a double bed combination.  We only have a handful but if you request one we will most likely provide one depending on availability.  I have reviewed your comment with our staff and we are working on ways to improve our hotel.  We appreciate your feedback and we hope that you give us another opportunity to better serve you.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez  Operations Manager

Summary: The front desk staff is not educated in customer service period.  I called two times in advance of our arrival date (Henry's mother is writing this) and it was approved.  Upon arrival, the front desk woman looked more sleepy than we were at midnight!  The next day, I noticed a sock over the fire alarm.  Several times our cards to enter our rooms were de-activated for various reasons - stupid reasons!  We were 5 total, grandmother (me) my son and my daughter-in-law, a 5 year old and a 4 month old!  The breakfast was quite scant really and you could not take the breakfast to your room!  That is nonsense!  Day 2, maintenance and the maid were called in to remove the sock from the fire alarm!  Disgusting!  Never enough towels in the room!  Had to call all three days for towels!  On
Manager Response: Hello babiFresn,  I would like to apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  I appreciate your review and your comments.  We have provided better training to our cleaning staff to avoid any incidents to our future guest.  I am glad that nothing happened to your children and that they are safe.  We have contacted your travel agency for a full refund to your stay.  Again I appreciate your time to write your review and we thank you for your feedback.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: WILL NEVER STAY AT THIS HOTEL AGAIN
Summary: I was very disappointed at this hotel. The room didn't feel clean, maybe because I saw a dead bug on a web at the window. I stayed on the 7th floor and right above my room was an awful loud sound of a fan all night that didn't let me sleep and left me feeling all tired for my Disneyland trip. The room vary ALOT from the picture I saw. The room was very narrow and we had to close the TV  cabinet door everytime somebody had to walk by not mentioning that the TV was super old. The breakfast was very simple and odd, it had Spanish rice. The breakfast area had big booth but they were to low and we all had hard time getting up. The breakfast area also has un even wood and tile floor with silicone connecting them. that caused a 78yr old lady to trip and fall. Management only came to
Manager Response: Hello pau201337,  I would like to apologize for having a not so comfortable stay at our hotel.  I am very sorry of all the incidents that you experienced during your stay with us.  We would like to emphasize that if you are not happy with your room our customer services agents are well trained to find you a room of your liking.  Our employees are not allowed to engage in providing medical assistance to any of our guest.  Our supervisors are only allowed to call the emergencies department for assistance.  I appreciate your comments and please accept my sincere apology.  Thank you,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: You get what you paid for...
Summary: This place was nice. Staff was very friendly. Room was basic. Bed uncomfortable and sheets and towels so ruff our skin was irritated for the next few days. Loved the balcony.
Manager Response: Hello Alexandra,  Thank you for your review and for your kind words.  We do feel that our hotel offers the best value for your money.  We are also very proud of having a professional staff that provides great customer service.  I will be checking on the towel issue they should not be rough but smooth.  We appreciate your comment and we hope that you choose our hotel for your next visit to the area.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Bad stay, not good for the price
Summary: The rooms are not very nice especially for the price they charge. The hotel staff act friendly but when you're waiting outside in the cold for over an hour because the bus driver left earlier than he was supposed to, they are of no use to you and will just make you wait. This hotel make this trip to Disneyland one of the worst I've ever had.
Manager Response: Hello Beabeachblonde6,  First of all I would like to apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our establishment. Yes our staff is very friendly and helpful, I am very sorry for the problem that you experienced with our shuttle.  Our drivers are not allowed to leave early from the hotel or from Disneyland.  If they had left because the bus is full they will make a double trip.  I will investigate this issue and I sincerely apologize for the misunderstanding on the shuttle schedule.    Thank you for your review and we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: ande enjoyed are stay, people were pleasant and friendly, warm breakfast could be better. Ice machine was broken had to global another floor level.  Other than that is was great!
Manager Response: Hello verslc27,  Thank you for taking the time and tell us about your experience at our hotel.  We are taking care of the issues that you had pointed out.  We are happy to know that your stay was great.  We are glad that our hard work is reflected in your comments.  We appreciate your comments and we hope that you choose our hotel for your next visit.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Okay for what our family needed on this trip
Summary: Okay for the price,and what we needed the room for .Probably wont stay here again. Woke up every hour to doors slamming .Also  we had 1 room with adjoin rooms on both sides didnt quit feel secure Stayed 2 nights  Breakfast  kinda weird with fried rice scrambled eggs with sausage in them  just was wierd
Manager Response: Hello Phillip O,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We appreciate your feedback and will use it to better our service and accommodations.  We have security that patrols the hotel at night, if you ever feel not secure please let us know and we can send them to help.  We appreciate your comments and hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We had a family trip to LA-Disney and stayed overnight here.  The room was clean and well kept, the hotel staff were very nice and warm. The breakfast spread was terrific and the staff was constantly refilling the stations. I didnt have a great opinion of this place but was pleasently surprised. Great place and value for money.
Manager Response: Hello rag_05,  We want to thank you for taking the time and review the Howard Johnson Fullerton.  We work very hard to provide great customer service and clean and comfortable rooms.  We are very happy to hear that your stay was great, thank you for your comments and hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We needed a place to stay for one night for our big family, that was reasonably priced! Not only was it a great price (under $75, for two beds!) it included a delicious breakfast for all six of us!! It was very clean, great pool, nice neighborhood, fantastic staff and very accommodating! Thank you for the great stay!
Manager Response: Hello Rex C,  Thank you for taking time to review our hotel and sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor community.  We work hard to give our guest great customer service and pleasant accommodations.  We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay and we hope that your next stay is with our hotel.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The staff was great.  They were friendly, courteous and responsive to our needs.  It was necessary to move us to another room.  The sink in the first room was backed-up and maintenance was unable to resolve the problem.    The security lock on the sliding glass door of the second room was inoperable, leaving us vulnerable to theft.  Maintenance temporarily solved the problem.  However, we were unable to use the door until the following day when a more permanent repair was accomplished.   As a result of the repair, metal shavings were left on the floor.    Hotel staff apparently doesn‚Äôt monitor for loud parties or excessive noise levels at night.
Manager Response: Hello John B,  Thank you for taking the time and review our hotel on Tripadvisor.  We appreciate your feedback, I will make sure that our maintenance staff is aware of your comments.  We are sorry if you experienced noisy neighbors.  Our front office staff and security are well trained in handling noise problems, they will make sure to take care of any issues right away.   Again we appreciate your comments and we hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The hotel is obviously poorly managed from a maintenance standpoint. The one elevator serving the tower has a multitude of issues , not the least of which is the expired (over a year) license and inspection certificate displayed in it. The paint is scratched chipped and worn throughout which just sets you up to be leery of the facility as a whole. It took us three different rooms before we got one that did not have a moldy musty stench, stains on the carpet and mold or hair left in the bathtub. The ice machine seemed to work but given the disgusting exterior and missing panels I did not attempt to harvest any ice as i would have feared for my health and my family's. The lobby was kept well but the rest of facility screams of run down or going out of business soon. Spend the
Manager Response: Hello Jared B,  First of all I would like to apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  We are working on getting the issues that you mentioned back in order.  I am sorry that you had to move three different times to find a room of your liking. This should not be happening to our future guest.  As far as the elevator goes, the permits are sent by the city inspector.  The city has been backlogged for the past five years, sorry for the inconvenience.  I appreciate your comments and we hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Thank you, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I stayed at this property for a Days Inn alliance meeting and my entire stay was wonderful. Knowing that it is a limited service hotel, I was not expecting the great accommodations they provided. The hotel itself is a very large, well maintained property and the staff was wonderful from front desk to housekeeping. The rooms are in good condition and all staff has a friendly/professional attitude. I would definitely recommend this hotel and decided to promote thier hospitality online for future guests. Great value and they went above and beyond to accommodate my special requests. Thank you for making my trip a convenient and comfortable experience. Thank you Liz for providing helpful information regarding the promotions you accommodated me with.   -Linda S.
Manager Response: Hello ModestoDaysInn,  Thank you for sharing your experience about your stay at our hotel.  I am proud of our staff for providing great service and I will make sure to mention it to them.  I hope that Days Inn chooses our location for your future meetings.  Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Great staff! Clean, comfortable tower room with fridge/micro, balcony with chaise & sitting area, 100 channels.
Summary: I was greeted with genuine warmth and quickly checked into a very nicely appointed room in the tower. Mgr Franciscu went out of his way to get me a micro/fridge as i was there for a convention for a week. He is the consummate professional, and really has a great attitude, always helpful.  Jessica & Angela were fantastic as well. The bed was one of the most comfortable hotel beds ever & there was a nice desk and separate comfy chair. The pool area is well maintained, with cabanas & comfortable chaise lounges.  The pool was very clean & was heated water, as it was chilly outside.  The breakfast is very filling with plenty of standards, scrambled eggs, potatoes, hotcakes, cereal, toast, fried rice, coffee.  Sure there are a few dings about the house but overall a great stay, and
Manager Response: Hello Jahmok,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are delighted to know that your stay was great.  Our staff takes great pride in their work and I will make sure to mention them in our next meeting.  We work hard to provide a clean and comfortable hotel to our guest.  Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: over all a great stay this is the second time I have stayed...
Summary: over all a great stay this is the second time I have stayed and do plan on returning great location!
Manager Response: Hello Sondra F,  Thank you for your kind words.  We are very delighted to know that we are the hotel of your choice.  It is a pleasure to cater to guest that appreciate our work and our staff at the hotel thanks you for choosing our hotel.  We thank you for your comments and we can‚Äôt wait to serve you on your next visit.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: 1st impressions are important to me, so I tend to take how a hotel treats it's customers as how they treat everyone.   Issues found: Zero security - none lobby doors/gates never locked even though there is a room key reader on all entrances 3pm check in - not one minute before and your lucky if it's 15 minutes after Cleanliness - maid vacuuming with broken vacuum/garbage bags left next to elevators/stains on room walls/lobby bathrooms grotesque Shuttle service - limited hours/never on time Breakfast - it seems like to save space they mixed the cut sausage links into the eggs Truthfulness - told I was staying in the newer part of the hotel, makes me shudder to think what the older part of the hotel looks like  The place has potential but did not live up to expectations :(
Manager Response: Hello Jason O,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay at our hotel.  We take guest comments very serious and we also use guest comments for ongoing training.  Security has never being a concern in our hotel during the day we do have security during the night shifts.  We will make sure to talk to housekeeping to make sure that they are utilizing only vacuum that do work.  Our shuttle only runs from 9-11 am and from 5-10 pm depending on Disneyland hours.  We normally run the shuttle in the most popular times and seldom are late by more than five minutes.  I am very sorry that your stay was not a pleasant one.  Please feel free to call our hotel and talk to our manager on duty if you need to discuss your stay further.  Thank you for your comments and we hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Unless everything else is booked, don't stay here!
Summary: The hotel appears to be decent upon arrival; however, once you step past the front lobby it's a different story. The hotel as a whole is disgusting and is falling apart. The halls were gross, the rooms were gross, and the staff is very unprofessional. We were placed near housekeeping which isn't a problem in any hotel except this one. The housekeeping staff was extremely loud at 8 am in the morning waking my entire family with laughing and unwanted obscene conversations. I step out of the room informing the staff of their nose levels, asking them to please be professional. This lasted for roughly five minutes.   Disgusting bathrooms, stained mattresses, heavily stained carpets, smelly bedding, obnoxious unprofessional staff, broken furniture, and a beat down rattling cage for a
Manager Response: Hello babygeorge2009,  Please accept my apologies for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  Your comments are very important to us and we always act upon what guest think about our hotel.  We have trained our housekeeping department to make the least noise possible during the morning hours.  Our housekeeping staff has never started work before 9 am.  I apologize if they cause you and your family an inconvenience but this will not happen again.  We do have three shuttle busses for our Disneyland trips.  I will make sure that they only use the best bus to better serve our future guests.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I stayed two nights and went to a R.E. seminar that was held at the same Hotel, the promoters apologized to us for the not very good room we had the class and agreed that the important thing was that we were learning. The breakfast was okay, the internet was decent. There was a wedding celebration Sunday, people were walking with cups of beers in their hands and on Monday the halls were dirty with trash from the wedding. When I walked to my car I noticed it was hit, there was not a note and I commented to the front desk and they apologized. I spoke to a police and told me that that was a criminal act of Hit and run and advised me to get the video. I called the Hotel and I was told that there were no videos so I am left with my car to fix from the stay in the Hotel. I have to go
Manager Response: Hello C T,  As your promoters apologized to you, I as well would like to apologize for a not so pleasant stay at our hotel.  I am truly sorry for the hit and run to your car unfortunately we do not have cameras that can reach all the way to the parking lot.  If there is anything we can do in regards to the incident please feel free to call our hotel and speak to our manager on duty.  We do have events during the weekends and guests are allowed to drink within the premises.    We thank you for your comments and hope to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: If you want to go disney, if you want good shopping and eating places close by - this is your best bet. The stay, breakfast and the experience is not as good as you would expect. You have free shuttle to Disney and walkable best buy, target, micheal and burlington coat factory - for us this was good. It was annoying to pay to keep your bags at the bell desk and also break fast charges were quite high. The rooms are ok.
Manager Response: Hello vtransform,  Thank you for your review, indeed we are centrally located and there are a lot of places to shop and dine around our property.  Our shuttle to Disneyland and our breakfast are complimentary, the only exception for breakfast is if your reservations was pre arranged by a tour company than you would have to pay individually.  I will make sure to revisit our charges for luggage handleling and make sure that they are not too high.    We appreciate your comments and hope to see you on your next visit to the area.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Look, this is an older facility.  You'll find some dirt, peeling wallpaper and popcorn ceiling.  BIG DEAL!  If this ruins your vacation, like so many other posters, get over yourself and go spend some time really traveling Asia, Europe, Latin America.  The rooms are comfortable and quiet.  The beds are fine.  It's a great place to crash, on a budget, while you take in Disney, Knott's and other local attractions.  The breakfast buffet is just fine...nothing special, but free and filling.  I'd return.
Manager Response: Hello mlotto7,  Thank you for taking time to review our hotel.  Like you, we feel that our hotel offers the best value in our city.  We offer complimentary wireless internet in all rooms and public areas, complimentary breakfast, free parking and complimentary shuttle to Disneyland on selected hours.  We do not have any extra charges other than room and tax but no resort fee like other hotels do around our area.  We are delighted to know that you will choose our hotel for your next visit to the city.  Again we appreciate your review and thank you for choosing our hotel for your future stays.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Walls were very thin.  I could hear everything our neighbors were saying.  Hallways were dirty and kinda gross.  Loud bangs all night in the halls from employees I'm guessing?  BRING EARPLUGS.  The actual room was pretty clean, except dirty carpet.  I wouldn't walk on the carpet without shoes.  Free breakfast was pretty pathetic, but free.
Manager Response: Hello btlflame,  We appreciate you taking the time and letting us know about your stay at our hotel.  I apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  We will be addressing all of the issues that you have mention in your review, thank you for your honest opinion.  Our priority at our hotel is to keep our guest 100% satisfied, if in the future you encounter any issues please notify our guest services agents and they will be more than happy to help you.  Our guest services agents are well trained to give you a room to your satisfaction and stop any noises bothering our guest.   Thank you for your review and we hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Vary nice stay, better than reviews say.
Summary: The Howard Johnson inn Fullerton was worth the money. Don't listen to the bad reviews, this place was perfectly fine. The best part is the money. It's very cheap for a nice place. Breakfast was nice, rooms were fine, and beds were comfortable. I would recommend staying here for a trip to Disneyland or if you are taking a train from Fullerton. This hotel is also close by to lots of restaurants, stores and convenient to train travel. I hope whoever you are reading this review will stay here for your next trip to Fullerton. Enjoy your stay!
Manager Response: Hello Robert F,  We are very happy to know that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that you think that we are a good value hotel.  We take pride in knowing that we offer the best value in town.  We have a great team of customer service agents that will do whatever it takes to keep our guest happy.  We also offer various complimentary amenities which makes the majority of our guest to become repeat customers.  We appreciate your review and we hope that you choose our hotel for your future stays.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I read some bad reviews on this hotel and I cant believe it was the same hotel I stayed in. The rooms were nice, clean, and the hotel staff was very nice! We had a big hot breakfast buffet for free. I would definitely stay there again! I am a flight attendant and have stayed in many many hotels, this one was great for the price!
Manager Response: Hello Michelle P,  We appreciate your honest review about out hotel.  We do feel that our hotel offers great value for the price paid.  We feel very proud of our staff for going above and beyond to keep our guest happy.  We offer amenities that most other hotels do not offer for the same price.  We appreciate you taking time to review our hotel and we hope that you choose us for your future stays.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: While this hotel is not in the best part and on a high traffic road, it is also nice that it is surrounded by many food and retail options. I especially appreciated the shuttle to and from Disneyland, but it was running late for departure in the morning so that put a little damper on the trip. The one suggestion that I have is that the shuttle should run every half an hour and until Disneyland closes, perhaps even a little after so that visitors can maximize their experience.   I liked the breakfast Buffett and was impressed by all of the hot food options, but it would be nice to have more fresh fruit and even cold options such as pastries/bagels.   The front desk staff were very attentative and willing to answer all of my questions, but did not seem too happy. Did not greet
Manager Response: Dear Felicia D,  Thank you for taking the time and tell us about your stay at our hotel.  Your comments will be reviewed with our staff managers and all the issues that you encounter should be resolve.  We will consider having the shuttle for extended hours, as this is one of the amenities chosen by most of our guest when making a reservation.  We feel that we offer good value for the price paid and our groupon deal can't be beat.  We appreciate your comments and we hope that you consider our hotel for your next visits.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Bought this at a special price through Groupon.  We stayed in the original wing (appears to be a newer tower wing) which is in dire need of some deep cleaning.  Comfortable room and beds although they don't have microwaves or refrigerators.  Great breakfast was included but again, the dining room could use a good cleaning (dirty windows, spiderwebs).  Personnel was very nice all in all.  Not sure I would stay here again unless I was sure to be put in the newer section.
Manager Response: Hello Christine H,  We appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor.  We are happy that you were able to enjoy our breakfast and that you had a comfortable stay.  We have a team that constantly delivers great customer service and we are glad that you mentioned your approval.  We have a team of cleaning staff that takes care of deep cleaning and we will mention to them the disapproval of your review about the cleaning of the restaurant.    We appreciate your honest opinion and we hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Thank you, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this property many other times. This time we stayed for 4 nights and it was very nice.  We enjoy swimming and the pool was clean and heated to a very comfortable temperature.  They offer pool towels at the front desk and that is nice too.  The room was clean and comfortable. We always ask to stay in a room at the back so the room is quiet.  The front desk staff were very welcoming and helpful when we had requests.  The breakfast is limited, but if you ask for something that is not out and they have it like plain eggs, they will help you very quickly.  We have always been satisfied with the room and if not we have asked to have changes made and the requests have always been granted.
Manager Response: Hello lanismom,  I am very happy to know that our hotel was successful in providing a comfortable stay to you and your family.  We appreciate your comments.  Our hotel strives to provide great customer service, and a clean and enjoyable room.  Thank you for making us your hotel of choice when you travel to the area.  Your comment is very valuable to us and we hope to see you again in your next visit to our city.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: First room we stayed in was located at end of hallway on first floor(#154). The noise level was unbearable from the high traffic hallway along with the stairwell exit right next to us. We called the front desk at midnight asking for another room but they told us all rooms were booked. The next day we were relocated to a tower room which was much quieter. When we arrived we thought the hotel lobby was updated but our rooms were very dated with peeling wallpaper and worn carpets.
Manager Response: Hello Irene C,  I am very sorry to hear that you had a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  We did have a sold out hotel due to a wedding reception and other events in the city, I apologize for the noisy neighbors.  We have security at night so anytime someone has issues with noise our security personnel is quick to respond and have the situation under control.  I appreciate your comments and we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better.  Thank you,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I should have known better.  Really, I should of.  The first clue that it was a mistake to stay here was that every cheap two-bit Chinese tour in Orange County begins and ends in this hotel's parking lot.    Parking.  They do have ample free parking which is a rarity anywhere close to Anaheim and this hotel is but a 15-minute drive to Disneyland.  Unfortunately when the tour busses are lined up in the early morning or late afternoon you may have problems getting into or out of your parking slot.  There is no such thing as a good room in this hotel.  Ever.  The first room we were given was in the ground floor and back in the rear next to the kitchen and / or laundry.  The room was dark and bleak -- almost dilapidated and there was the constant hustle and bustle of what seemed
Manager Response: Hello gdbill,  I would like to apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel, I am very sorry that we were not able to provide great service.  Your comments have been taken very seriously and will be address accordingly.  Yes, we are the starting point of many of the tours in California but we have never had issues with the parking lot.  I will personally investigate why tour busses block vehicles in the morning or afternoon as they have designated areas for parking.  I am happy that our team accommodated you to three different rooms and will investigate why they did not follow up to make sure that you were 100% satisfied with your room.  We appreciate your feedback and it is our hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Thank you,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: HoJo's as it it known as is a very comfortable hotel, clean room, staff very helpful and friendly, this was our 4th stay, and we will certainly be coming back. The hotel is in a convenient location for shopping, public transport, and if you are driving anywhere, it is just off one of the main freeways in and out of LA.
Manager Response: Hello Kalynju,  On behalf of our entire staff here at The Howard Johnson Hotel and Conference Center I want to thank you for this great review.  We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you are a loyal guest to our hotel.  We are looking forward to serving you again on your next visit and thank you for making us your hotel of choice for your travel needs.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Friend and I stayed here during a trip to Disneyland October 2013. Carpet was dirty, wallpaper was peeling off the wall in certain spots. I accidentally dropped something and it rolled under the bed, so I moved the bed and it was DISGUSTING!! The must not move the furniture when they vacuum because there were french fries older than me under there! Ice machine worked intermittently because the room next to the ice machine kept unplugging it because it was so loud. All other machine on other floors were not working, so I had to go down to 1st floor (we were on the 5th). The breakfast was ok. Only good thing was you can make your own toast and the coffee was fresh.  Although the food was in those catering dishes with the sterno heat underneath, the food was cold. And you have to
Manager Response: Hello LisaMJ74,  First of all I would like to apologize to you and your friend for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  I would like to thank you for taking the time and write about your experience at our hotel.  I am very disappointed in our team for not making your stay a memorable and enjoyable one.  Our team has been instructed to take any possible action to keep our guest happy and without inconveniences.  We will be discussing possible solutions for the issues that you have pointed to us and we will make sure that our future guest's stays are less tragic than yours.  We appreciate your feedback and we hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The hotel staff is amazing but the rooms are average.  It's weird to me that establishments still have bulky tvs that get horrible reception.  The channel coverage was minimum at best.  The hallways were freezing as the air conditioning was pumping as it if was 90 degrees outside although it was in the low 70s.  Rooms were clean but definitely not to my liking.  I was just a little uncomfortable walking around barefoot.  There was also a musty smell to the room.
Manager Response: Hello Christina D,  Thank you for giving us your feedback about your stay at our hotel.  I appreciate your praise for our staff; we indeed have a passion to provide great customer service.  Our staff has been trained on helping our guest to the best of their ability; they will go above and beyond to make our guest happy.  If you give us the opportunity to serve you again, please ask our representatives for a room of your liking.  They will definitely accommodate you to our best room possible or give you an upgrade.  We appreciate your feedback as it helps us address issues that most of the times are not brought up to our attention.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our vacation stayiing here.  15 min   from disneyland parks and free service to go there. Their staff are excellent guys
Manager Response: Hello Alexis H,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay at our hotel.  We take pride in providing great customer service and we appreciate your comment about our great staff.  We are happy that you liked our Disneyland service, our shuttle to Disneyland is complimentary and we have great feedback from our guest about our shuttle.    Your feedback is very important to us and we thank you for your time.  We will be delighted to provide great service for your future stays.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: do not stay at this hotel!! It is dirty and unsanitary in most of the places in the rooms. We had free breakfast but did not even go because we were so disgusted by the room that we just wanted to leave ASAP!
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer,  I am very sorry that you had a bad stay at our hotel.  Please accept my sincere apology.  I would like to mention that our team is well trained in helping our guest have a pleasant stay.  They will do anything possible to make sure that your needs are met.  If a guest is not satisfied with their room we always offer another room and possibly an upgraded room.  This is not an excuse for our failure to your ruined vacations; I hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: This room was probably the dirtiest, most run down room I've ever stayed in.  Our room was nothing like what was advertised, and was no where near clean.  It stunk, and my son and I both have skin rashes after staying there.  Breakfast was terrible and barely worth the price (free).  The only redeeming factor was the friendly staff.  I have no complaints about them, but it hardly makes up for the downfalls of this hotel.  Don't stay here!
Manager Response: Hello David K,  First of all I would like to apologize for providing to you and your family a room that was not of your satisfaction.  Like you mentioned in your review our staff is friendly and well trained in providing great customer service.  They will promptly make sure that you have a room up to standards and to your satisfaction.  We do not like to falsely advertise our hotel, what you see in our website hojomaingate.com is what you will get.  We appreciate your feedback as it gives us an idea on what our guests think about our hotel‚Äôs facilities and services.    Thank you for your comments.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: If you are only interested in a decent room this would be OK. Grounds need to be kept better, Public areas in need of an update.
Manager Response: Hello Michael B,  I appreciate your feedback and I am glad that you enjoyed your room.  However I am concerned that you felt that our public areas need better keeping.  I will make sure that our cleaning staff is working hard and keeping everything nice and clean.  I will pass your message to ownership about updating the hotel for future consideration.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Staff was rude.  Fight broke outside our room for over 30...
Summary: Staff was rude.  Fight broke outside our room for over 30 minutes & no one came afterccalling security.
Manager Response: Dear Ashley B,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us a little bit about your stay at our hotel.  Our staff is trained to promptly respond to incidents with our guests.  My investigation shows that they calmed down the situation and I will make sure that next time it is done promptly so other guests are not inconvenienced.  I appreciate your feedback and it is our hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you better.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I am only giving this hotel 2 because of the front desk staff (I spoke to LaLa many times and she was very nice).  The staff was very friendly and accommodating to my needs.  That is where the good will end.  The rooms are very outdated, mold in the bathroom, torn curtains, damaged windows, old TV, and burned out light bulbs.  Stayed for 2 nights while traveling through the area to go to Disneyland.  We booked the property mainly because of the free breakfast and shuttle to the park.  Well, neither day did we make it to breakfast because they stopped serving at 9, would not good if they would keep breakfast open until 10 during the weekend. Took the free shuttle to Disney and was given a pick-up schedule.  The last pick-up was to be at 11:15.  We arrived at the drop off point at
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am very very sorry to hear about the horrible stay that you experienced at our hotel.  We have addressed the issues with housekeeping about the cleanliness and the amenities of the hotel not working.  Our bus schedule does not change on a daily basis and our bus drivers are prohibited to leave Disneyland earlier than what they are scheduled.  I apologize for the misunderstanding.  Our breakfast hours are set forth by brand standards meaning we can‚Äôt change the breakfast times because all chain hotels offer breakfast at this time.  We do have security at the hotel patrolling all night long unfortunately we were not able to stop the brake in of your vehicle.  We were very concern about the incident and that is why we were taking pictures to make sure that this incident was reported to the police.  I appreciate your review and feedback, feel free to give us a call if you feel that we need to discuss this incident further.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Dirty swimming pool, missing lightbulbs, no fridge or microwave in rooms, ice machines do not work. I did not enjoy my stay at this hotel. The do offer a free shuttle to disney and breakfast is good. Coffee is pretty bad though.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Please accept my sincere apology for your bad experience at our hotel.  I have personally supervised and made sure that our amenities are in working condition.  I am sorry about not providing a fridge and a microwave we offer them at a minimal charge if you need one in your room.  We appreciate your feedback and I hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Thank you, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Cusotmer service for the lactating mother
Summary: I was at this location on business. i performed at a wedding on June 8, 2013 and I was a brand new mother again that was lactating.  While I was there, I found no privacy in order to express milk.  I went to the front counter and talked to Shela and she offered me a room to ensure that I had the privacy I needed.  I am writing to commenc Shela and Jose for excellent customer service and asuring that as a customer I was comfortable very well taken care of.
Manager Response: Dear Jenny K,  I am glad that our guest services agent Shela was accommodating to your request.  At our hotel we strive to provide the best customer service possible, we feel like we are reaching that goal when we see reviews like yours.  I appreciate your review and we hope that you choose our hotel for your future travel needs.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Parked out front of this interior corridor hotel. Check in was fast. Elevator was slow. Our room was on the 4th floor and faced the pool. It was a large room with a king bed, which was not bad to sleep on but they need new pillows. The room was quite. The shower/tub combo was very slow to drain. The hotel is definatly in need of a makeover. Chipped paint, tile needing to be replaced. The flooring in the lobby. The room came with a free breakfast buffet. Rice, watermelon, potatoes, scrambled eggs with sausage mixed in, toast and a few cereals. The coffee was pretty good.  We did not go to Disneyland but it is about a tem minute drive to get there and they have a shuttle. They also sell various tickets in the lobby. The pool looked nice but we didn't use it. Overall it was a
Manager Response: Hello Katriciav,  I want to thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay at our hotel.  We appreciate your feedback; reviews like yours are very beneficial to our business as we can determine what our guests think about our hotel and where to improve.  Your detailed review is precise on what we offer and of the hotel's condition.  Our guest services agents are well trained to promptly respond to any guest issues and try to fix them on the spot, definitely let our front desk agent know if you are having an issue with your room and they will either fix the issue or accommodate you in to a room of your satisfaction.    Again I appreciate your feedback and it would be our pleasure to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: The Stay was average. If you have a friendlier staff, they...
Summary: The Stay was average. If you have a friendlier staff, they could smile and say good morning ir good afternjon.  The rooms need a little help.  Our toilet leaked.   No phone in room.  All yhese would be helpfull.
Manager Response: Hello Carmen C,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at our hotel.  We have taken care of the problems that you mentioned with your room and our front desk manager was made aware of your experience with our customer service agents.    I appreciate your feedback, all of our guest‚Äôs opinions are very important to us and we take reviews like your very serious.  We have learned of deficiencies and opportunities that the hotel has by gathering reviews and discussing them in our management team.  Thank you again for your review and we hope that you consider our hotel for your future stays.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I don't know where to start. We booked this hotel with Expedia's unpublished rate program. We thought we were getting a 3 star hotel. We only needed the room for 12 hours, as we had just come into town for a Dr Appointment. Just needed somewhere to crash for the night. If we had booked for more than 1 day, I would left and found other lodging. The lobby was nice enough and that's where it ended. We were in room 116. After leaving the lobby you either go straight or turn right to go to the "tower." To the right didn't look too bad, it was brightly lit with nice shiny tile flooring. Unfortunately our room was not to the right, but down the dimly lit hallway that looked like it could be the set of a horror movie.  First thing we noticed when we entered was the smell that hit us, a
Manager Response: Hello Rebley,  First of all I would like to apologize for the less than pleasant experience at our hotel.  We would like to thank you for a very detailed review.  It‚Äôs very hard as hospitality professionals to hear that your experience was so unpleasant and so many things going wrong at the same time.  I would like to say that we welcome our guest equally; we do not distinguish how you made your reservations or how much you are paying.  Our guest services agents are trained to handle these types of situations; if they were not able to fix an individual problem they will definitely offer a new room to your satisfaction.  I apologize if you felt that they were not willing to do anything at the time of check out.  Please feel free to contact the hotel if you would like to discuss your stay further.  Again thank you for your detailed review and we hope that you give us the opportunity to stay at our establishment in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: It did the job, but I wouldn't stay again.
Summary: We booked the room so we could get an early start at Disneyland. We didn't use the shuttle, but they have one. The decor, smell and upkeep of the hotel reminded us of a mom and pop Chinese restaurant. The free breakfast was cold and gross.
