No ventilation in the bathrooms, bugs in the bed room and ripped curtains. The bed was very comfortable, and the pool was semi heated which was nice. If you need a bed and a shower this will work, but I don't recommend staying more then one night. Also,I paid 72$ for this room online it was going for about 99$ I would not pay 99$ for this room.
Manager Response: Hello Ariana H,  We would like to thank you for your honest opinion about our hotel.  A review like your help us gage how we compare against our competitors.  Our goal is to always provide great value for your money and I am sorry that we failed you.  We feel that our hotel offers good value with our complimentary shuttle to Disney, complimentary breakfast and parking.  Our rates are placed strategically below our competitors and we do not impose a resort fee or any hidden fees, you pay only room rate plus 10% city tax for your stay.    We appreciate your feedback and we hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Comfortable bed & great shower with plenty of pressure.  It would be great if the hotel upgraded its rooms (mini freg, microwave, flatscreen HDTV- instead of the old power-hungry poor-quality RCAs).  It could also stand to have better lamps & a new rug if your picky about such things.
Manager Response: Hello Rudy R,  I want to thank you for taking the time and write a review about our hotel.  I will pass on your comment to ownership to consider future renovations to the hotel.  Our mission is to provide clean and comfortable rooms to our guests as well as being a great value hotel.  We have a complimentary shuttle, breakfast, parking and best of all no resort fee and only 10% tax in the city of Fullerton.  Your charges at our hotel are only room rate and 10% city tax.    We appreciate your comments and we hope that you choose our hotel for your future visits to the area.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: First thing we noticed was food and garbage all over the parking lot and pool area  Room smelled so bad like smoking in it  Deck had gum and smoke butts all over Blood stain on bedding  Complained to desk and manager was like okay lol didn't give a s@@t   Do not recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Please accept my sincere apology about your stay at our hotel. If you had informed one of the front desk agents during your stay rather than at check-out we would have offered to move you to a different room to your satisfaction.  However this is not an excuse for not providing a smoke free and clean room that meets standards, for this problem I apologize. We have changed the schedule of the staff of the public cleaning area so they give priority for the outside to look nice and clean first thing in the morning.  We appreciate your comment and if you felt neglected please feel free to call me so we can discuss about your stay further.   Again I appreciate your review and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manger

Summary: This place has a nice lobby and that's about it.  The food in the restaurant was subpar, the bathrooms on the main floor were absolutely (toilet paper and feces everywhere) and the bathroom in my room was covered floor to ceiling in mold.  I have pictures to prove it.  Staff was nice, but not very attentive.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at our hotel.  We take our guest comments very serious.  We have prioritized taking care of any mold that might be in any part of the hotel.  We have also discussed in our meetings how to improve our customer service and have a more attentive staff in our reception.  Please accept my sincere apology for your less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  We hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Pool area was in BAD conition with exposed wires for lights,The Mexican palms have not been trimed in years and where falling on the ground.One missed me and my boy by inches.Second floor ice maker inop.Parking lot was VERY DIRTY and have not been cleaned in weeks.I will never stay at this hotel again.I stay at hotels average 8 times a year thru out So.Cal and this has to have been the worst I have stayed at in years.
Manager Response: Hello Robert AY,  First of all please accept my sincere apology for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  I appreciate you bringing up issue to our attention, I agree with you that the palm trees have not been trimmed and it is that time of the year that they should be trimmed again.  I am sorry that a palm stalk almost hit you.  We have taken care of the issues that you have pointed out about our public areas and I hope that your room was in better condition that the outside of the hotel.  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at our hotel and we hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: An average hotel good for transit and cheap stay. But there are lots of shopping outlets at a walking distance. Tours4fun have provided this hotel as a start/end point for west coast tour starting from Los Angeles.
Manager Response: Hello Biju M,  Thank you for your review; we definitely are a start/end tour hotel.  Tour companies favor us due to our easy access to the freeway and the city.  We also offer a free complimentary shuttle to Disneyland that many tour companies take advantage of.  The value of the hotel is reasonable because we do not impose the high cost of a resort fee and elevated tax percentage other cities around Disneyland have.  Again thank you for your review and we hope to be your hotel of choice for your next visit to the area.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I stayed here from 8/23/13 - 8/27/13 for a trip to Disneyland for my son's fifth birthday. The room we were in had a moldy bathroom because there was no fan in it and the room wasn't very clean but we decided it would be fine because we wouldn't be spending much time at the room. They say there is a free Disney shuttle but there is a long break during the day in which it doesn't run (so if you plan on having a break during the day you have to take a cab or the city bus). We used the city bus and it was $2 a person and easy to take however on our last night we waited for the free shuttle at 11:15 and at 11:30 we called because it hadn't showed up. The front desk agent informed us that the schedule had changed (even though the shuttle driver gave us the schedule earlier that day
Manager Response: Dear Amanda W.  I want to start by apologizing for failing to deliver a memorable stay to you and your son.  I want to thank you for taking the time and letting us know how your stay was.  Please be assured that your comments are very important to us and management takes guests comments very serious.  We have addressed all of the issues that you have pointed out to us and rest assure that they have been taken care of.  It is my hope that you reconsider and give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Got there early then 3 pm check in time the front desk let us check in early the room was ok old and smell little bit carpet in dirty need to go the ceiling is ugly The hot water didn't work we call front desk within 5 mn the maintenant guy show up and fixed it other than that everything is fine second night we ask for more towels in 2mn the girls show up with more towels than we asked for and check out girl was friendly no problems  over all is good wouldn't stay again unless they change the carpet
Manager Response: Hello Charles P,  I want to thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay at our hotel in Fullerton, Ca.  Your feedback is very important to us; reviews like yours are helpful to our management team in addressing any opportunities to improve.  I am happy that our staff was prompt to your requests.  I apologize for the inconvenience of the carpet; the carpet issue has already been addressed.   We would be honored if you decide to choose our hotel for your next visit.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We stayed on a trip to Knotts Berry Farm for 2 days. The staff helped us into a more accomodating room in the tower building and were very helpful and polite.  The room was clean.  Would stay again.  We were awakened by banging on the door across the hall at 2:30AM however... the outside entrances need better security as the card readers were disabled.
Manager Response: Hello Delyn E,  I am very proud of our staff at the Howard Jonhson Hotel and Conference Center for being helpeful and polite.  It gives me great satisfaction to know that our staff is professional and that they are providing great customer service and clean rooms.  I will have our maintenance department look in to the card readers for the entrances. I appologize that the card readers were not functioning.   Thank you for taking the time to fill out this review and we would feel honored to welcome you in your future visits to Fullerton, Ca.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: read the reviews after booking, so we asked the receptionist to give us their newest rooms because of the rooms. she sent us to the new tower, the rooms were very outdated (bulky old tv), hallway and elevator was old with smelly carpet. room was ok but old for being in a new tower. The worst howard johnson I've ever been too.
Manager Response: Hello Veronica H,  I want to thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Reviews like yours help our hotel gage exactly how we measure against our competition and also tells us what our guest are expecting from our hotel.  I apologize for the hotel not being up to standard, our website has pictures of the actual rooms and facilities, please accept my apologies if you think that we are misleading.  We have a team of cleaning staff that are working very diligently to make sure that we keep a clean and welcoming hotel.   Thank you very much for your opinion and we hope that you give us another opportunity in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Great for a standard hotel stay
Summary: Spent one night here after a long day at Disneyland and didn't want to drive home. We checked out various properties, but really didn't want to spend a lot for just one night's sleep. This hotel was a pleasant surprise. Called ahead to let them know we'd be late - no problem. Check in was quick, room was clean and more than adequate. A/C worked great, and people working were very friendly. it's true, the bathroom isn't designed for tall people. Shower pressure was nice and strong.   Only mistake was we were given conditioner and body lotion, but no shampoo. I was impressed by the quality of the pillows and the bed - clearly somebody spent the money here, even if the decor has seen better days. Breakfast was better than I expected, but hardly a fancy brunch. We decided to check
Manager Response: Hello Meerkat92101,  It is a great pleasure for me and my staff to hear from a guest perspective that our hotel was a good value to you.  Our team is very pleased with your review, it gives us a sense of accomplishment in our objective to always provide great customer service, clean and comfortable rooms, and value for the money spent.    I apologize for the inconvenience of the shampoo which is a terrible mistake and should not happen again. We have extra stock of shampoo in our front desk that we could have provided for you.  I appreciate your feedback and it will be our pleasure to welcome you back in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Overall room was OK stayed in better conditions for less, but for the location we would stay there again. Lala at the counter was very professional answered all questions with no trouble very good at her job.
Manager Response: Hello Michael B,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review about our hotel.  We appreciate your comment about the good location of the hotel.  I wish you had given us more specifics about the condition of the hotel so I could have addressed those with our management team.  I will make sure that Lala knows about your review it gives me great pride that one of our team members gave you great service. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you soon during your next visit to Fullerton, Ca.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Rooms were clean and beds were comfortable.  Bathroom not made for taller people.  Breakfast was just OK.
Manager Response: Hello Craig J,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at our hotel.  It gives me great satisfaction to know that our team was friendly and that our staff provided clean and comfortable accommodations.  I am sorry to hear that the shower was too short, I will be checking with our maintenance department to make sure that we are up to standard with the height of the showers.  We appreciate your comments and we hope to be the hotel of your choice for your future visits.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: This property is old and in bad need of a complete renovation. My bed room carpet was filthy dirty and my bedroom floor was wet from a leak I'm the plumbing. I would have been in much better conditions had I simply stayed home.
Manager Response: Hello Adrain J,  Like you I feel highly disappointed on my team for not delivering clean, working, and comfortable rooms.  I understand that our hotel is in need or renovation but we should be providing clean and comfortable rooms.  I appreciate your time to fill out a review on our hotel; reviews like yours help us improve on the areas with opportunities.    Thank you for your comments and is my hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at the Howard Johnson Hotel and Conference Center for a trip to Disneyland with a couple of my friends. We stayed there for two nights and the service was horrible. When we arrived at the hotel we were greeted with horrible service. It took a while for us to be acknowledge by one of the front desk representatives. The front desk lady was not welcoming and looked like she did not want to help us. Her attitude was not welcoming and rude. As for the room, it was clean, but don't expect anything fancy. With the room comes a free breakfast buffet, yet it was terrible. You mine as well just buy breakfast at Mcdonalds or something. Upon checkout the service was once again horrible. The problem with this hotel is not so much the room but the customer service. The only
Manager Response: Hello Arianna E,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay at our hotel in Fullerton.  First of all let me start by apologizing to you and your friends for failing to deliver great accommodation and customer service.  I am sorry that the room, breakfast and customer service were not up to standard.  I have spoken to the respective department managers to let them know about your disappointment about our hotel.  I am glad that you were able to utilize our shuttle service and that you thought was a good value.    I would be honored if you gave us another opportunity to serve you better during one of your future visits to Disneyland.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Not recommended for more than one night stay
Summary: The hotel is a good location and the pool area is nice, however the rooms were dark and run down, didn't remove shoes when in room. The breakfast could use a little variety, we were there for 4 mornings and after the second day, the scrambled eggs and sausage were hard to eat. No yogurt and the watermelon was cut up so thinly and small it was impossible to pick up. No other fresh fruit offered. No muffins or other breads. Would not recommend for more than a one night stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  First of all I want to thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay at our hotel.  Reviews like yours help us recognize the issues that our guest experience and that we need to address to ownership.  I am sorry that your stay was less than a pleasant one and that our hotel did not meet your standards.  Your review was forwarded to ownership to consider adding more variety to breakfast.  I appreciate your comments and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I must say that I was expecting more from this hotel and was disappointed. No fridge in the  room, powdered whitener for your coffee, no electric kettle so even if you brought your own coffee with you, you couldn't boil it...no coffee cups, you have disposable paper cups...no restaurant on site but within walking distance to fast food outlets. A two for one voucher for a drink on Friday night where they wouldn't serve our beverage in a tall glass, we had to settle for a plastic cup! Breakfast was ok but clearly they cater for the Asian tourist. 2nd morning they were so busy I was asked to leave after I finished my toast. WiFi didn't work at all on the 4th floor.. On a positive note, the pool was great after a long hot day out and about.
Manager Response: Dear Sharon Boyle,  I want to thank you for writing a very detailed review of our hotel.  Reviews like yours help our management team fix the items that need improvement and provide an enjoyable and memorable stay to our guests.  I apologize for the items that were not up to standard, we follow a standard set forth by Wyndham and all of our items are standardized.  I am happy that you were able to enjoy our pool as I agree that our pool is very nice and relaxing.  Above all I sincerely apologize for a less than pleasant stay at our hotel and it is my hope that you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The place was a basic hotel with some added bonuses. My room was clean with clean beds, tons of pillows, and a working bathroom. It's a suitable place to rest after being at both Disneyland and California Adventure the whole day on consecutive days. The staff was friendly and the reason I give this place 4 stars is all the free perks; parking, wi-fi, breakfast, and free shuttle to Disney. Granted, the breakfast is boring and generic and the wi-fi is slow but this place is a great value at the price I paid.
Manager Response: Hello OscarS91,  I want to thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay at our hotel.  We do have complimentary items that most hotels do not have in the Anaheim area near Disneyland, I am glad that you were able to utilize all of these amenities.  Our breakfast is a standard breakfast for a Howard Johnson but we add the eggs and a few more items.  We have taken care of the slow or inoperable Wi-Fi connection.  I will let my teams know that they are providing friendly customer service and clean and comfortable rooms.    We will be honored to be your hotel of choice for your future visits to the area.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: The staff was great but we found out bread crumbs under the...
Summary: The staff was great but we found out bread crumbs under the blanket and toilet tank water was running
Manager Response: Hello Annabel B,  I am very happy to learn that our team provided great service to you.  We have taken care of the items that needed attention that you pointed out.  It is unacceptable to find out that your bed has bread crumbs when you expect it to be cleaned and ready when you check in.  Know that this item has been addressed and will never happen again as well as the running toilet.  It is our hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you for your future visit to the area.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Horrible unhelpful receptionist, first room given was unmade
Summary: Good thing- Shuttle to Disney land, bus was on time. Bus window pane was about to drop off. We stayed there on two different occasions. The first night , we stayed in 3rd floor. We asked the receptionist if the room was quiet and she said that all the room were away from main road and was quiet. Anyway, the room we had face the main road and we could see vehicles from the window and the cars were within 200m away from the window. The noise made it difficult to sleep.  I then requested a quiet room on my next check in on 11 July2013.  on arrival, we were given a  room in second floor. I mentioned that I had requested a quiet room a few days earlier. She said nothing was noted and I asked why when I have specifically requested so. Anyway, she said that there was a back room in 4th
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I would like to thank you for taking the time and write a very detailed review about our hotel.  I would like to apologize for the unpleasant stay that you had at our hotel.  Please know that all the issues that you pointed out have been addressed.  The managers of each department have retrained their employees and we thank you for pointing out issues that otherwise will be unheard of.  It is my hope that you consider our hotel for your future visits to our area.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The hotel supplied plenty of towels and clean sheets. We stayed 7 nights and 8 days. The bathroom needed to be remodeled as it had mold in the shower. Other than that the staff was great and we didn't have any noise issues. We rented 2 rooms and they put them together without me even asking!
Manager Response: Hello Leslie R,  Thank you for your review.  I am glad that our staff was proactive in setting up your rooms even before you requesting them to be next to each other.  We have taken care of the mold issue in the bathroom as you have pointed out.  Our entire staff read your review and we are happy that you felt that they were great.  We would be honored to serve you in the future for your stays in Southern California.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Hotel seemed shabby and uncared for. Poor and repetitive selection for breakfast. No food service in the evening. Unworkable wi-fi connection. Botched the initial reservation. I've had much better stays at Best Western motels on Highway 5.  No value added.  Am embarrassed that our organization chose this hotel (for an ed-tech conference in Fullerton). Clearly does not cater to U.S. visitors.  Should be made clear that this hotel caters to foreign visitors whose expectations may be lower.
Manager Response: Hello Laura R,  First of all I would like to apologize for the less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  I would like to thank you for taking the time and write a review about our hotel and pointing out issues that most of the time our management team does not hear about.  I am very sorry that my team failed to deliver a comfortable stay and know that your comments do not go unheard, we share guest comments with all managers and employees.  Thank you again for your review and it is my hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Best hotel to stay at in Fullerton
Summary: Vanessa and the rest of the staff at the front desk help u as best as possible when u stay here. When u need something they can help. I enjoy my stay every time I stay here. I would recommend this hotel to anyone
Manager Response: Hello Topnouch,  I want to thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stays at our hotel.  My team has learned from your review that they are providing great customer service.  It gives me great satisfaction to know that you would recommend our hotel and that you enjoy staying with us. We look forward to your next stay and thank you again for choosing our hotel.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Unlike the pictures on the website, the room is very outdated, and my room is very close to the road and hard to fall sleep, quite disappointing..also..they don't have tissues and water for drink. Good thing is they have free wifi......
Manager Response: Valued Guest,  Please accept my sincerest apologies for your less than pleasant stay at our hotel.  I would like to point out that we try not to display or promote on our website more than what we offer, however I am sorry if you feel that you were mislead in any way.  I am happy that you were able to use our wifi for your needs. Again please accept my apologies as we failed to deliver an enjoyable stay to you.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: My stay was a great one. This hojo was excellent in almost all areas.  I  was very pleased with my stay with them  i give it 4 stars.
Manager Response: Hello Stephen S,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel.  It gives me great satisfaction that our team is doing everything possible to please our guests.  I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We will be honored to be your hotel of preference for your next visit to the area.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager.

Summary Heading: great stay at a great price
Summary: The hotel is walking distance to eateries and shops.  The room was neat and clean and the beds were comfortable. Overall, we had a wonderful stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Della H,  I want to thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and thank you for giving us such a great score all across the board.  I will gladly pass your comments to our entire staff at the Howard Johnson Fullerton.  Our number one priority is to provide our guests with great value and it gives me great pleasure to know that we are accomplishing our goals.  I will definitely praise our cleaning staff for a job well done.  Again thank you for a great review and we hope to see you in the near future.  Thank you, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel, friendly staff..but outdated rooms.
Summary: Not bad for the price..we stayed for a week to visit Disneyland, Universal studios, and SoCal sites. During the stay we noticed a couple of things..Ice machine signed pointed to the end of the floor but we followed it and discovered it was located on the 2nd and 7th floors only-it was quite funny we were thinking the signs was pointing towards target for ice. Breakfast buffet was not full served as advertise, but they cooked it really good. Location was great and close to Disneyland, freeway, gas stations,restaurants, and target. The area felt safe due the security guard that was always walking around at night. Laundry area was convenient. We would stay here again for last minute booking.
Manager Response: Hello masubi55,  As a hospitality person it gives me great pleasure to know that our hotel has friendly staff and that we are a good hotel.  I am glad that you felt safe in our hotel and that you enjoyed the convenience of the location to the local attractions.  Our hotel does have opportunities to become better and your feedback was very important in pointing out to ownership that we needed more ice machines.  Our priority at the Howard Johnson Hotel Fullerton is to serve our guest with a smile.   I appreciate you taking the time for this review and hope that we can be your hotel of choice for your future visits.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Good hospitality; however, rooms were a bit outdated.  Some...
Summary: Good hospitality; however, rooms were a bit outdated.  Some of the outlets weren't working and the breakfast was far from good.
Manager Response: Hello Everardo R,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us a little bit about your stay at our hotel.  Our staff's priority is to provide clean, comfortable and affordable accommodations to our guest.  We appreciate your feedback and thank you for letting us know that you felt that our hotel has good hospitality.  It would be our pleasure to have you as our guest in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Really enjoyed the stay here. It is a good location with...
Summary: Really enjoyed the stay here. It is a good location with easy access to fun parts of Southern California. The hot breakfast buffet was hot and kept full during breakfast which was nice. This is a well kept up property and the staff was friendly. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Erik R,  On behalf of all the Howard Johnson team we thank you for rating our hotel with such high score.  We appreciate your time to fill out a survey of our hotel.  I will make sure that ownership knows that the Howard Johnson team provided exceptional service to you.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and that you felt that the hotel is in a good location.   I sure hope that this will only be one of your many future stays to come.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We spend 3 nights and enjoyed our stay. Did not get to use the pool. We did use bus service to Disneyland and the drivers were friendly & nice.  Breakfast was very nice and had a nice variety of food to choose from.
Manager Response: Hello Carmen F,  On behalf of our team we want to thank you for posting a review of our hotel.  Reviews like yours give us great pride on the services that we provide.  I have personally told our team about your review and have praise them for a job well done.  I am happy that we provided great service and we hope to see you in the near future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The staff was wonderful! They work hard to please but unfortunately what it would take to make us stay was beyond their scope. The lobby looked ok and hearing about the free breakfast and shuttle to Disneyland made it appealing. Upon check in at 1pm, we found out the shuttle takes a 6 hr break during peak check in times from 11:00am-5:00pm therefore no real benefit to us. The hotel is outdated and desperately in need of renovations. We were transferred to 3 rooms and each room was horrible. Showers had mold, there was a sticky substance on the wall and the carpet was disgusting. Totally disconcerting considering I was traveling with small children,  We booked through Travelocity and really should've researched this hotel first because after the fact, we read the reviews and
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of our hotel in Tripadvisor.  First of all my apologies for the misunderstanding with the bus schedule, we do run our complimentary shuttle to Disneyland only in the mornings from 8-11am and in the afternoons from 5-10pm.  Thank you for letting us know that our staff was wonderful.  We do have many deficiencies in our hotel that our management team is already addressing.  Your review will be sent to ownership for consideration.   Again thank you for your review and we hope that you give us another chance in the future to better serve you.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: My mom asked for two double beds and a rollaway and I got there I got one bed and the rollaway bed was not available.  The room had wet stains on the roof and it seemed dirty!!! My worse experience ever!!!
Manager Response: Dear Susie R,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at our hotel.  I am very disappointed to learn about your stay at our hotel.  Our central reservations made a mistake when booking your reservation, they gave you a room with one king bed.  I take full responsibility for mistakes made on our end however I investigated and there were no requests made to change you to a room with two beds or an extra rollaway bed.  Please accept my sincerest apologies and I hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Thank you, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I've never stayed at a Howard Johnson's and was a bit hesitant on weather or not to stay at the Howard Johnson in Fullerton. But once we checked in I was pleasantly surprised at how nice the property was. The staff was very helpful and friendly .. our room was very clean and I was traveling with my parents and brother and his family so we needed multiple rooms and they accomodated us close to one another as requested.  We overslept so we didn't get to take advantage of the FREE buffet breakfast.  The facility was so pretty throughout the lobby and the outdoor pool was beautiful.  I'd stay here again if I traveled back to LA area.
Manager Response: Dear Liset H,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of our hotel.  I am very pleased to know that my staff is doing everything possible to accommodate our guests.  Reviews like yours give us a sense of goal accomplishments after all our hard work.  My entire team and I would like to thank you for your review and for liking our hotel and we look forward to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Wayy over priced for how dingy the hotel was. Perhaps of it were closer to Disneyland (say in walking distance) I could understand the price per night. Unfortunately it isn't. The carpets were awful. The shower was dirty and covered in hard water build up. Our sheets were stained.... Gross. The bathrooms in the lobby were the worst. Just bad bad bad. It's a shame housekeeping doesn't show up earlier. All of the furniture in the lobby was kind of beat up and dated. Basically the entire hotel could really benefit from a facelift
Manager Response: Dear Irene T,  We appreciate your time to fill out a survey on Tripadvisor about our hotel.  I would like to apologize for your bad stay, your comment has been forwarded to our departments heads (Maintenance and Housekeeping) We have implemented new programs to increase the quality and cleanliness of our rooms and the entire hotel. I will make sure that ownership gets a copy of your comment to consider changing the furniture in the lobby.  Again I appreciate your comments and we hope that you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: You get what you pay for. If you just want something close to Disneyland and its affordable, this is the place. If you want a clean room, working air and toilet, and extra features, stay away!
Manager Response: Dear Max R,  I want to thank you for taking the time to fill out a review on our hotel.  We appreciate your honest opinion about the quality of our hotel.  We have implemented new programs to improve the quality of our rooms and the quality of our customer service.  We appreciate that you feel that we are an affordable hotel and we would be honored if you would give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I stayed at the hotel 4 nights. The  free breakfa was ok, it did not have much of healthy food other than watermelon. Thesame scramble eggs, rice, potatoes and pancakes every day. The pool is very nice and clean we enjoyed it. My big problem was the nasty carpet. It was beyond dirty. It had black spots everywhere. The sofa chair was super dirty we did not use it. The curtin in the room was ripped. I stayed at the tower and from the old elevator to the parking lot there was a horrible smell. The hotel looks very outdated if you use your room just to sleep i guess for the price is ok, but if you enjoy staying at your room stay some place else. I had not choice as had already prepaid my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  First of all I would like to apologize for your recent unpleasant stay at our hotel.  It is very disapointing to find out that your room had so many issues.  We have reviewed your comments and you are definitely correct in your statements.  We have a program in place to deep clean the entire hotel and we are happy with the results that we have seen so far.  We appreciate your comments and we hope that you give us the chance to better serve you in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Nice hotel that offers free shuttle to Disneyland and breakfast.  My family enjoyed our stay. I just wished they offered connecting rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We want to thank you for taking the time to post a review about our hotel.  We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that you liked the complementary shuttle to Disneyland and the breakfast.    We apologize for not having any connecting rooms at the time of your stay we only have a limited number of those rooms and sometimes it is difficult to accommodate our guest to those rooms.  We thank you again for your review and we hope to see you soon.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The employee that checked us in was rude. She threw us a room key and said okay next. I asked what room is it? She said 4444. I said how do we het there from here? She stated It is on the fourth floor? My husband and I said wow. We found our room on our own. The next morning I called to ask asked what time breakfast is over? the one who answered the phone said 0900, It was 0830 I said okay thank you. She said dont bother coming down its all put away and than she hung up. My husband went down anyway and there was breakfast. When I booked I asked for a poolside or the tower. It was posted and when I got there it was denied. There were other issues but to much to write. I would have to say the most pleasant people were the cooks and housekeepers. They should be in charge of the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I apologize for the bad stay you had at our hotel.  At Howard Johnson we strive to provide excellent service to our guest.  Incidents like the one you experienced with our customer service agent should never happen at a hotel.  We will be sharing your comments with our front desk staff and taking proper measures so that this incident will never take place again.  Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: I've probably traveled to this hotel 8 times in my life...
Summary: I've probably traveled to this hotel 8 times in my life. The food is horrible the lobby decor is hideous and the rooms are just okay. The tv service has never been stellar
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of our hotel.  I apologize for your inconvenience.  We will forward your review to ownership of the hotel to consider re decorating the lobby in the future.   Again thank you for your review and we hope you give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Floors were so stained we put towels on the floor,  elevator stopped at tge 3rdvfloor everytime, bath fan not even hooked up, curtain ripped in 2 places, breakfast was poor at best. Dont waste your money here!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review,  I apologize for your bad stay at our hotel.  We have started an intensed program to have all the carpets cleaned and it's been progressing in a positive manner. Our fans work with a central unit in the roof even if you feel that they are not working they are still pulling air. It is not acceptable that the curtains were ripped and I will make sure that this will not happen to our future guests. I will pass your comment about the breakfast to ownership to consider a change of menu.  Thank you, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Nice enough room, but the TVs are outdated and they charged extra for a fridge. The towels and linens are old too.  Shabby Chic I guess?
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I am glad that you liked our room, we are working very hard to provide clean rooms for the satisfaction of our guest.  I apologize if you had old towels in your room, we try very hard to make sure that old towels don't make it to the rooms even if they are clean.  I will make sure to pass your comment to ownership for futere investments on tvs,  refrigerators, and microwaves.  Thank you for your review and we hope to have you back at our hotel in the near future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: The hotel was very beautiful and located in a very convenient area. Stores everywhere and right behind a gas station! Most places are within walking distance. Upon arrival, the front desk agent checked us in early and upgraded us to a King/Double bed room and told us about the amenities as well as the Disney shuttle. She was very pleasant! Also the front desk agent Didi was very pleasant, very helpful and extremely efficient! Several times I've had to come to the front desk for inquiries and she always greeted me as well as other guests with a smile and welcoming demeanor. She also never carried inappropriate conversations with her fellow coworkers. Breakfast could have been better, maybe Belgian waffle makers, different fruits & a variety of juices could boost it. I stayed for
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We would like to thank you for completing a review of our hotel.  We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay as well as our amenities.  We will let Didi and everyone at our hotel know that she provided exceptional service to you.    We will forward your comment to our restaurant and banquets manager for proper training of their staff, comments like yours are very helpful in knowing what areas of the hotel need improvement.  Again we would like to thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I loved the hotel room the only down side was not having a microwave and fridge. I also didn't get to enjoy the pool because it was closed during my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I would like to thank you for taking the time to complete a review of our hotel.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.    I have sent your review to ownership about providing microwaves and refrigerators in every room which is something that we have already discussed with ownership and comments like your will help us reinforce our stand on this investment.    I sincerely apologize for the pool being close during your stay.  We had to change the filter due to the water being cloudy and it happened overnight therefore giving us no time to warn our guest of the issue.  We want to thank you for your review and we will be delighted to service you in the future.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Service was great, however the room was lousy. I really...
Summary: Service was great, however the room was lousy. I really felt I was staying in a cheap motel, not a HoJo. When we got in the room, there was a large wet spot on the carpet. It eventually dried up, but it made the room look cheap.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We want to thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at our hotel.  Thank you for letting us know that the service was great, we are glad that our customer service representatives gave you great service.  I sincerely apologize for the wet spot in your carpet we will make sure that our cleaning staff does not release a room to be rented if there are any issues with the room.   Thank you again for your review, Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Had a great stay at Ho Jo's again. Since this is my 2nd time staying here in less than a year.Found a great deal on groupon.This time it was even better. We got a first floor room with a patio area right by the pool.Great room it had a king bed and a full bed!! Our tv wasn't working right . They changed it and everything was great. Great place to stay. Neer shopping and lots of places to eat. Great breakfast too but should be till 10 not 9 I needed that extra hr sleep. We felt a earthquake when we was there.But went right back to sleep. Were from the San Francisco area were use to it.Thanks for another great stay !!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for taking your time to post a review of our hotel.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you felt that our hotel was a good value.    I will pass on your comment to ownership to consider extending the breakfast time to 10 am.  Thank you again for your review and hope that you choose Howard Johnsons for your future stays.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: I got there and noticed a stem of a flower on the floor. all of the electrical devices were unplugged and there was hair on the bathroom floor. which i assume was from the cleaners. I chose not to complain but to see if they could redeem themselves. on the 2nd night the staff had actually short sheeted the bed and I found a dead bug on the floor. then I complained, and nothing was done throughout my whole stay. the carpet was stained and torn. not to mention the elevator had broken during my stay and i had to walk up 5 flights of stairs. I will never stay there again. I used my automotive service to book the hotel. to top it off they overcharged me and am still fighting with them to credit my money back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of our hotel.  I apologize for all the inconveniences that you experienced.  We have shared your comments with our cleaning staff as well as our customer service staff to better our service in the future.  We have started an intensive program to clean the carpets of our hotel and we are very happy with the results.  Please call our front desk manager at 714-992-1700 ext. 807 to clarify your overcharge and he will be able to help you.  Thank you again for your review.  Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: We are staying here for two nights, and I seriously regret it! The hotel is nothing like it looks on the photos. We had to throw the comforter on the floor because there is a blood stain on it. Yuck! The curtains in the room have mold and the room smells muggy. The carpet is complete stained. Worst hotel experience ever!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced at our hotel.  I have shared your comments with our cleaning staff so that they provided better service in the future.  We have started programs to clean carpets, floors, walls as well as making sure that no stained linen makes it to a guest room from our laundry.  We thank you for sharing your experience with us, comments like your assist us in figuring out our areas of opportunities to better service our guest. Robert Vasquez Operations Manager

Summary: Hot buffet breakfast was great.  Staff in restaurant were awesome.  Disney shuttle was super convenient.  Layout of room was fantastic, but carpet was filthy.  Room had musty smell and front desk staff offered us the opportunity to change rooms.  This hotel is a great choice if you plan on spending the day site-seeing and using your room for sleeping and showering.  You can't beat the location, price, breakfast, and convenience of Disney shuttle.  Free parking is awesome.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for completing a review of our hotel and we are glad that you enjoyed the amaneties at our hotel.  We are working in having a better housekeeping department to ensure that our guest do not experience inconveniences with dirty carpets or musty smells.  We thank you again for your review and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I wish I took a picture of the place to show everyone. It was so old and dingy and dirty that it looked more like a haunted house than a hotel. There were dead bugs on the floor, and mysterious stains on our bedsheets and on the carpet. The lighting was very poor (which added greatly to the haunted house effect). The beds might as well have been concrete. I wouldn't have been surprised if I was murdered by a ghost or that girl from The Grudge in the middle of the night...  To make it worse, the staff was unbelievably rude when we checked in late at night. The monster at the desk got into a fight with my father because he was next in line to check in and she completely ignored him to let another party cut the line. I tried to talk to the manager the next morning but the desk
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments about our hotel.  Please accept our sincerest apologies for a bad stay and bad customer service.  Your comments will be forwarded to the front desk manager to ensure that bad customer service will never happen to our future guest.  I will also forward your comments to our housekeeping department and ownership to ensure that our cleaning staff is well trained in cleaning the rooms and for ownership to consider future enhancements for better lighting.

Summary: Staff was friendly at check-in.  The location was great.  That earned the hotel 2 stars.  When we entered the room it smelled bad.  We quickly turned on the air conditioner and hoped the air would help mitigate the smell.  The carpet was badly stained and the wall paper was peeling off of the walls.  Unfortunately, the side door into the hotel was not secured so anyone could have walked in without a key card.  We tried the hotel because of the great Groupon deal but overall this hotel was a disappointment and we will not stay again.
Manager Response: I'm sorry for your stay.  If you let the front desk know, we can move you to a room to your satisfaction, and also report the room issue to Housekeeping to take care of.

Summary Heading: Howard Johnson.. Average stay on tower side
Summary: we happen to get a groupon and i saw the reviews too but i sd lets take a chance . .. so i can tell they had bed bugs at one time there was one still smached in the wall but we didnt see or find any so that was kewl!  the carpet i am sorry i have to agree with the reviewers.. they need deep cleaning bad but i always keep sandals on even in 5 star hotels.. the hotel was quiet and it was peaceful you can tell they are still working on the hotel.. i saw cleaning people all over during day and night cleaning pool etc ( i smoke so i go down stairs and i alwasy see someone who is cleaning and greeting) over all we had a relaxing time. the food.. umm yeah free food not very appetizing.. the excercise area was broke , the restaurant was gone.. i was like wow !  but as far as just laying
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  That's entirely unacceptable about the smashed bug in the wall.  Please let our front desk staff know and we can move you to a room that's more acceptable to you.  We do not have an exercise area.  I've been trying to get it removed from our websites for a long time.  The restaurant is closed at this time due to the extensive options within walking distance (ie. In-N-Out, Lee's Sandwiches, Sprout's Market, Costco Pizza!!! etc.)  We're continually working toward improving the quality of our housekeeping staff.

Summary Heading: old, outdated and dirty, don't stay here!!! The pool was...
Summary: old, outdated and dirty, don't stay here!!! The pool was dirty, the carpets were filthy as were the lounge chairs. The whole place needs to be redone. Good location, walking distance to costco, walmart, restaurants, etc. The staff was pretty friendly as well. The breakfast was good, but didn't change at all, so got tired of it after a few days.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.    I'll double check with my maintenance staff to make sure they're regularly cleaning the pool.  I'll check with Housekeeping to make sure they're continually deep cleaning the carpets.

Summary Heading: A Cheap Dump with Friendly Staff
Summary: At about $75 a night, this was a bargain.  It's only 2 miles from Disneyland with a free shuttle that leaves every hour, and it included a free breakfast that is a small step up from your continental variety.  The staff were very friendly whenever we countered them, though they weren't the polished and professional type you'd see at higher-priced hotel chains.  The facilities, however, were very rundown. Carpet is old, marks on the walls, ugly paper signs taped up wherever you look, a bizarre d√©cor in the lobby and restaurant that didn't make sense, chairs and tables that were in bad shape, etc.    WiFi was free, but it barely worked regardless of where I was in the hotel.  I was not the only one to experience this issue.  The guest shop has limited hours but a good selection of
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  I went into detail regarding Wi-Fi on your Yelp review.  The gift shop is independently rented out and run and their posters or advertisement don't reflect the opinions of the hotel.

Summary Heading: You Get what you pay for
Summary: The price is very reasonable, the **outside** of the grounds have recently been renovated and look very nice, the inside is very clean and the breakfast is not bad at all  I had to get a handicap room because I broke my foot and was unable to stand up while showering. The showering chair in the hotel room had a screw coming up from the base of the chair! This is very, very dangerous. We let the front desk know and they sent maintenance over right away to retrieve the chair and get it fixed. We returned later that night (at least 12 hours later) and the chair was not in the room. We called the front desk and they brought us back the same chair! This is very dangerous and could have caused a serous injury!   We let management know and they gave us one of the nights for free.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  I apologize that my maintenance staff failed to take care of the chair issue.  I'll forward your feedback to the maintenance manager.

Summary: The hallway smelled of smoke (our room was supposed to be a non smoking room) and when we arrived, there was an old coffee cup on the patio filled with cigarette butts.  In the bathroom there were towels still hanging on the door from the previous guests and it did not look like the carpet had been vacuumed. The hotel looks nice on the pictures, however it is old and our room and bathroom, were old and dirty. I can not recommend this hotel and will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  It sounds like your room was not cleaned properly.  If you'll let the front desk know we can move you to a room that's to your standards.  We will also log your complaints and hold the housekeeper who cleaned your room responsible.

Summary: Excellent location, gracious staff, clean comfortable rooms, with balconies overlooking patio and pool area, for the price of could be given five stars.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  Our tower room, balconies, are very popular for the view.

Summary: very pleasant stay rooms were nice and clean front desk personal were very friendly and I forgot a painting in one of the rooms i had reserved and the housekeeping staff turned in so that it could be forwarded to me which I just recieved this past wednesday.  Thank you so much great job all the way around.............. I will stay there again
Manager Response: I appreciate your feedback.  I will pass your review onto our housekeeping staff.

Summary: Stayed here on two separate nights with a local tour group who make use of the hotel presumably because of price. Really, don't bother and for many of the reasons listed by other reviewers. It is concerning that despite the avalanche of commentary here on the low cleanliness standards the management continue to provide the same lame excuse. Front-of-shop staff were generally surly but would respond postively if you were polite. There was quite a lot of work happening at the time and whole corridors were blocked off. The restaurant seemed only open for continental breakfast - though at $8 its adequate. The little shop has some helpful little emergency items and fruit if you arrive late.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.    We have 289 rooms between two buildings that are each cleaned by one of many housekeepers, so we are constantly trying to receive feedback on the cleanliness of each housekeeper.  As soon as we get a complaint on a room, we investigate which housekeeper cleaned the room and hold them accountable.  The vast majority of our housekeepers (over 20) clean the rooms exceptionally well.  We have implemented a thorough checklist that must be completed for each room by each housekeeper and verified by a supervisor.  We are continually working toward improving the training and quality of our housekeeping staff.  If you have an issue with your room, please let the front desk know so that we can improve and we can generally take care of your issues.  Breakfast is free for guests who book directly through the hotel.  There are some tour companies that sell packages that have a negotiated room rate that does not include breakfast.

Summary: I am extremely disappointed in our recent stay with you. The rooms were filthy. We were moved and the second rooms were as dirty as the first. The staff was very rude! We were there to celebrate our twins 5th birthday. Our trip was ruined because the housekeeping staff stole my pain medication. I have lupus and severe rheumatoid arthritis. I can not function with out these medications. I ended up spending most of our days in the park in pain sitting on a bench, missing out on watching my kids enjoy themselves. When we alerted the front desk they did nothing they didn't even apologize. This was supposed to be a once in a lifetime trip and it was ruined!
Manager Response: I apologize for the state of your room.  We don't expect anyone to stay in a filthy room and can place you into a room to your satisfaction.  Our housekeepers are trained not to take any personal belongings from a guest room unless it's in the trash can.  I have brought this issue up to my housekeeping department to investigate further.

Summary Heading: Explore other options in the area
Summary: Hoping this place would be a step up from Best Western in Camarillo, hopes dashed. The room overlooking the pool, the quite side of the building is a farce. Dated furnishings, stained carpet, large patch over wallpaper, mildewed bathroom caulking, generally disappointing. Not worth the Benjamin Franklin for 2 double bed (room+tax).   2 Classes of rooms, one with balconies facing the pool, the other are room windows (standard issue) facing the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We don't expect any guest to stay in a room that's not to your satisfaction.  Please let the front desk know and we can move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: Disgusting, dirty. We checked in and checked right out. There was food under beds, dirty spots on carpet. Toilet paper in the room. Feels like they clean rooms maybe twice a year that's if. It's crappy. Bus schedule for Disneyland can change without notice keep in mind that its like a 3 mile walk. Decided to pay more and sleep comfortable. Thanks Double tree we will see you guys again!!

Summary Heading: Thought it was going to be like holiday innn
Summary: was looking on hotels.com and had previously stayed at the local holiday inn. it was late, and needed a room, so when I saw breakfast and the two word name starting with H I got a little confused and just went with it. The cleanliness of the room (Stains on the carpet, a cigarette burn on the comforter, a wirenut (yeah...a wirenut) resting on top of one of the pictures....and the tub slip mat was old and lifting...oh yeah...and it had trouble draining.) I'm not a complainer...my wife did call down and wanted to just clarify that the cigarette burn was not ours, and we did not want to be charged for it, as we not only did not do it, but are non smokers...the response she got was, "if you want a discount you have to call on monday....." I am assuming lots of people are unhappy at
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize that was our front agent's response.  We never expect hotel guests to stay in a room that's not to your satisfaction and they should had worked toward addressing your concerns.  I'll forward your review to our Front Desk manager.

Summary Heading: The location and the front desk service where what we...
Summary: The location and the front desk service where what we expected but i believe they should pay alot more attention to their housekeeping department and make sure that all rooms have what they advertize on their page. We had to request the microwave and the small fridge,we also kept requesting for our room to get cleaned and have our sheets and beddind changed daily but never happened.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  I've implemented a thorough checklist for every room to be completed to minimize housekeeping issues, including rooms that stay multiple days.    I'm not sure which rooms are advertised as microwave and fridges, but they're for extra cost.  Sheets are typically changed every other day here, but if you requested them to be changed everyday, they should had been changed.  Your feedback will be posted and read by my Housekeeping staff.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Dirty,Nasty Housekeepers need help learning to clean rooms.. Run from these FAST!!
Summary: All I can say is stay away from these..Not worth what you pay.Gross and dirty,Housekeepers DONT CLEAN!!!
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear about your stay.  I've implemented a checklist for each room cleaned that will need to be filled out by the housekeeper and reviewed by supervisors.    I've also implemented a checklist to ensure that rooms cleaned for multiple night stays are completed.

Summary Heading: My disney stay at Howard Johnson fullerton
Summary: I have mixed reviews of this hotel.  The best staff at your hotel is the shuttle drivers.  I had my brother who is in a wheel chair and they were so helpful and acted with such courtesy in aiding me with him.  The staff at the reception area  and restaurant were very attentive. The complimentary shuttle service and breakfast is much appreciatec.  The heated pool was very enjoyable.  On the negative side,  the room was clean was not up to par with clean leanest. there was toe nail clippings in the balcony.  on Tuesdays the house keeper left the  beds very untidy. The comforters on top of the beds were full of wrinkles and the pillows were put in no order, just thrown at the top of the beds wirhout any care.  At the last day as we were packing to check out, I checked for any items
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I have implemented a 34 point checklist that every Housekeeper goes through for every room and is also verified by a supervisor in order to minimize any missed areas.  With feedback from our guests, we also track down the responsible housekeeper and hold them accountable.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Stay Away from thsi Hotel if you CAN!
Summary: The hotel sounds good and looks good from the outside facade, but when you walk along the narrow corridors, you are greeted with dark walkways and dirty floor carpets. That is not all, the room is not that clean and great too. The rooms definitely need refurbishing and new wall papers or paintwork. The toilet is basic. Cleanliness is so so. If you are given a choice, stay away from this hotel until the management improves it. Unfortunately some tours packages use this hotel as pickup and meeting point for their foreign guest. Poor choice of accommodation especially if you are new in LA and this hotel does not give due justice to California or LA.
Manager Response: I apologize for the quality of your stay.  As management, I am implementing new procedures, including mandatory checklists for every room, in order to improve the quality.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Room had an bad smell. Carpet was stained. Beds were very...
Summary: Room had an bad smell. Carpet was stained. Beds were very small. I should have taken my own blanket. Kids did enjoy the pool.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about the quality of your room.  If you'll let the front desk know, we'll make sure to move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: very great stay, would definitetly stay there again. love...
Summary: very great stay, would definitetly stay there again. love the buffet breakfast and staff was freindly.

The hotel it self looked clean, but the rooms were dirty, no toilet paper, hair in the restroom floor, ants in the dresser. Very dissatisfied talked to the manager the next day expecting the problem fixed, but when we got to the room at night  1 of the beds wasn't made their was still no toilet paper n the room defenetly had not been vacuum at that time i called front desk and demanded to be switch to another room, which it was still not really clean n the door that connected the rooms wasn't looking.
Manager Response: I'm very sorry regarding the issues with your room.  I will investigate and make sure the responsible housekeeper is held accountable.

Summary: On the first night there, I had to change the bed cause the maids had not done them. Pulling the sheets off to see stains and boogers not the business. Then to wake up early to shower to very, very cold water. The boiler had broke. So all the hotel had no hot water. But after all that the stay was fine. Just make sure to inspect your bed.
Manager Response: I apologize for your stay.  We had some emergency boiler repairs that needed to take place and have since fixed the issue.  We have informed our housekeeping staff to be more proactive for people who stay more than one night, and are doing extra inspections to ensure the rooms are being cleaned properly.

Summary: The rooms were very dirty, there was a sock under the bed. There were stains all over the carpet. The shower was clogged, standing in 4 inches of water is not a shower. There were ants and the coffee pot was so dirty. I will never stay here again.

Summary Heading: Filthy Hotel from the parking lot to the room!
Summary: This was the filthy hotel room I have ever stayed at!!!! The walls were really dirty dirty dirty... floors were cover in dirt and hairs! Had problems sleeping, the smells were so bad... toilet was plug and hair balls coming out of the tub drain... no hot water from the sink! we‚Äôre planning on staying a week but left after a two nights of hell.  I have travelled the world! And this was the filthy hotel / room I have stayed it I would classified the hotel below a hostels.  I would never stay at a Howard Johnson Inn Hotel again!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Last year I stayed in many hotels room  Plus this is the frist time I would fill out one of this reviews... That how bad it was!

Let me start off by saying I wasn't expecting a 5 star hotel but I was expecting it to be clean when we checked in the first room they gave us was "clean" and ready to be occupied so the girl at the front desk was told. my daughter and I walked in and the room was not clean the beds looked like some one was sleeping in them so the moved us to another room. This room was not much better between the smell,water damage walls,mold in the bathroom and the fact my kids didn't want to take their shoes off because the floor was so dirty. We had booked this room for 3 nights after the first night we stayed we packed up and checked out and moved to a different hotel we will never stay at this hotel again.

Summary Heading: Hotel was not the nicest but I was expecting that, however...
Summary: Hotel was not the nicest but I was expecting that, however the floors were stained and the second night of my stay the water pressure completely died only leaving us with scolding hot water, we reported it however they did nothing to resolve the issue
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  Someone had vandalized the main cold water intake valve into the hotel which was why there was no cold water.  As soon as we heard about the issue we were able to locate the vandalism and solve the issue within a couple hours of troubleshooting.

Summary Heading: Very dirty and houskeeping was horrible
Summary: We recently stayed 4 nights. We booked 2 rooms and both the rooms were horrible! They were very dirty. There was hair in the tub when we got there. There was no hair dryer cause it had been ripped off the wall. Housekeeping does not work around the clock so we had to wait till the morning for clean towels. Each night we came back to the room our key did not work. We kept having to walk to the lobby for new keys. The breakfast was the same everyday and it was not good at all. Sure the shuttle is free to disneyland but It is a death trap. The driver ran a red light and the emergency exit window would not latch shut. Also The doors to the shuttle did not fully close. I do not know why anyone would give this hotel a good review. Do not stay here. Horrible
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  If you have issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can move you to a different room.  When we find out about issues, we try to resolve them as quickly as possible.  We have staff that can bring you towels until midnight every night.    Breakfast includes sausage, eggs, pancakes, potatoes, etc.  Pictures can be found on our main website.  I'll double check to make sure the shuttles are safe.

Summary: There were stains everywhere! The breakfast is not great but tolerable. The gym was broken and the room smelled. It had a musty smell throughout... To top it all off I got charged $100 for a coffee stain on the curtain. We never had coffee there. The coffee pot was broken! Honestly how could u even keep track?! There were stains everywhere... I really didn't like the hotel, very dirty.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  The Gym has been discontinued and we're working with the various websites to take down the pictures.

Summary: booked online free breakfast, booked through take tours paid more no breakfast, mangment shoud be fare with guest, please no cheap practice for not offering breakfast if booked with take tours or others, location is great, staff is good, Anthony was very helpful mate him twice worked night shift, Hardy bell boy was very helpful for travel arrangements, overall great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  The tour companies have contracted rates and some of them specifically do not include breakfast in their rates.  I recommend you let your tour company know you demand breakfast and we can adjust their room rates to reflect that.

Summary Heading: Price of room was reasonable. Length of stay was 4 nights...
Summary: Price of room was reasonable. Length of stay was 4 nights. Room was dirty with food containers and trash from previous guests under the beds and behind end table.  Bathroom floor looked dirty. Had to call for toilet paper and asked for extra towels.Then after an hour had to call again to remind them. Floor was not vacuumed or mopped during our stay. Front desk staff said manager would contact me by phone the next day, no call was ever received. Worst offense was maid entered room when Do Not Disturb sign was up.  Took dirty towels and emptied trash, did not make beds, clean the bathroom or replace empty TP rolls. Had to ask for cold cereal and milk, none was displayed at breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.    If a room is not to your satisfaction, please let the front desk know and we can move you rooms.  We hold the housekeeper responsible if we receive a complaint about the stay.   We change the beds every other day unless specifically requested by guests.  There should be a card that explains that in every room.  I'll make sure that every room gets double checked that they have the sheets.  We don't advertise the cereal, and it's only on special request.  Thanks again for your feedback.

Summary: This was by far the most disgusting place I've ever stayed . After changing rooms 3 times they upgraded to a "suite" that had a dirty tampon stuffed in the light fixture in the bathroom. Lookedike there had been a mouse that ripped up the carpeting behind the couch to build a nest. Cigarette buts and pizza slice found on our terrace.  At 9pm. The 4 th floor had piles of dirty laundry outside each room one with a dirty maxi pad laying on top.   The health dept. needs to close this place for good
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay.  We are tracking down cleanliness issues in order to hold the assigned housekeepers accountable.  The 4th Floor also was unacceptable and the housekeeper responsible for that is being held accountable.

Summary: I recently stayed here, why it had such a high rating, not sure. It smelled like cigarettes though it was non-smoked, there was mold in the shower, it was dirty all around, stains on the comforter, chair, and floor. Not worth the price. The walls were so thin, you could hear the room next to you perfectly and the people in the hallway. There might as well shouldn't have been walls.
Manager Response: Please let the front desk know what the issue is with your room and we can move you to a room to your satisfaction.  With your feedback, we can make sure that rooms that aren't ready for rent should not be rented.  We can also track down which housekeeper is responsible for cleaning the room, and let them know about the shortfalls.

Summary Heading: Our stay was good, but the building structure is run down...
Summary: Our stay was good, but the building structure is run down and shabby looking. But received good service

Summary Heading: Poor Breakfast, Broken Fitness Room , No Hot Tub, Room not...
Summary: Poor Breakfast, Broken Fitness Room , No Hot Tub, Room not ready at 5PM, Only 1 roll of toliet paper, Grounds had stains.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  We offer hot buffet breakfast that includes scrambled eggs and sausage, potatoes, pancakes, fruit, and more.  Pictures can be found on our main page.  The fitness room is out of order and I'm informing my staff to no longer tell guests it's available.  It'll take some time for the websites to reflect the change.  If you have any shortages in your room, please let the front desk know and we can take care of your issues.

Summary: After having consistently stayed at this Howard Johnson's for several years, I was totally disappointed with this year's stay. First of all, the room we stayed in was supposed to be nonsmoking, and yet, smoke smell was apparent throughtout room and floor. Also, a non working smoke alarm kept going off at all odd hours of the night in a very loud and annoying ring. The rooms are definitely not as clean as I remember them to be, for example, a tissue was on the floor (purposefully) and remained there the entire trip. The cleaning staff was very noisy throughout the morning. I will not be returning at all to this Howard Johnson, regardless of the convenient location. I have let my friends and family know about the disappointment of this hotel. I hear that the Hyatt and others are
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.    If your room has any issues, please let the front desk know and we can usually move you to a room that's to your satisfaction.  Ultimately, we want to keep our housekeepers accountable if there are issues with cleanliness and your feedback is important for that.  About two months ago, we had issues with our Fire Alarm system, and they have since been fixed.  Our hotel offers free hot breakfast, a free shuttle to Disneyland, a low tax rate, free Internet, no resort fee, and numerous other free amenities that most other hotels closer to Disneyland will charge you for.  I believe you will have a hard time finding another hotel that offers the same value we offer our guests.  In fact, if you do find one, please let me know so I can compete better.

Summary: There was no karaoke bar as advertised and the pool was out of commission. Pool heat specifically. We had a tower room with patio, that was nice. Nothing special about room. Linens are old, could use refreshing. Good, for a cheap overnight stay, if you don't plan on using an ammenities.  Buffet in am, nothing special, but at least there is hot food, not just bagels and croissants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  There is no Karaoke bar as listed on the front entrance of our hotel.  The pool issue has been fixed.  The linens should not have any holes, thinned, rips, or stains.  If they do, please let the front desk know and we can switch them out.  They will also log the complaint to our Housekeeping department where we can figure out which housekeeper allowed linens of that quality in your room.

Summary Heading: Should have spent more for a better hotel
Summary: First of all, the service was great and props to the shuttle driver for taking us to Disneyland early!! The rest was somewhat of a horrible experience.... -My family missed a whole day of Disneyland because they got the flu. We were told "Ya it seems everybody here is sick." Somebody was throwing up every day of our trip. -My sister in laws tub drain was plugged. They spent a lot of time trying to fix it. All of our rooms were together so she didn't want to move. When she looked at the new room, it was dirtier than the one she had, so she stayed and showered at her parents room. (They were good to give her a discount on the room, but it would have been nice not to deal with the problem on vacation. Again, should have paid more money for a better experience.) -There was toast
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I'll try to address each issue:  - We keep our housekeepers accountable, so if a room is not to your satisfaction, we can move you to a different rooms to your standard.  We will also research which housekeeper was responsible for not cleaning a room thoroughly.  - Toast is never acceptable to be smashed in the hallway.  I'm disappointed in my staff if they didn't pick it up.  - We opted to wait on major repairs for the hole in the ground until after Spring Break to minimize guest inconvenience.  We would basically have to turn off the water completely to make full repairs.  - You can ask restaurant staff for cereal.  We don't really advertise it, but it's available upon request.  - The pool is now heated again.  It was unheated for a couple of weeks due to some plumbing issues.  - I'm guessing you're referencing the pool tables.  I'll remind my housekeeping staff to make the rounds.  - The refrigerators and microwaves should've been cleaned in advance.  I have since reminded my housekeeping staff to ensure that they're clean prior to delivery!  - Some days that are extremely busy, our housekeepers are working as fast as they can to get as many rooms cleaned as possible.  - If the front desk failed to bring you a alarm clock and hair dryer after the tenth time requesting it, that is extremely disappointing.   Thank you again for your review, and I'll be forwarding this to my front desk, housekeeping, and maintenance department.  We failed you on your trip.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in 2009 when it was a Wyndham resort and it was wonderful.  We didn't think the name change to a Howard Johnson Inn with the Wyndham subtitle would mean such a change in the hotel.  Everything had gone to pot in this hotel.  There was even a gaping hole in the hallway near our rooms where a water line had ruptured some time ago.
